abs

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.abs.php

Version Description
8.0.0 num no longer accepts internal objects which support numeric conversion.

apache_note

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.apache-note.php

Version Description
8.0.0 note_value is nullable now.

apache_request_headers

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.apache-request-headers.php

Version Description
7.3.0 This function became available in the FPM SAPI.

apcu_cache_info

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.apcu-cache-info.php

Version Description
PECL apcu 3.0.11 The limited parameter was introduced.
PECL apcu 3.0.16 The "filehits" option for the cache_type parameter was introduced.

apcu_fetch

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.apcu-fetch.php

Version Description
PECL apcu 3.0.17 The success parameter was added.

ArrayIterator::asort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayiterator.asort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

ArrayIterator::ksort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayiterator.ksort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayiterator.natcasesort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayiterator.natsort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayiterator.uasort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

ArrayIterator::uksort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayiterator.uksort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayobject.asort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

ArrayObject::ksort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayobject.ksort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

ArrayObject::natcasesort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayobject.natcasesort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

ArrayObject::natsort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayobject.natsort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

ArrayObject::uasort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayobject.uasort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

ArrayObject::uksort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/arrayobject.uksort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

array_chunk

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-chunk.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If length is less than 1, a ValueError will be thrown now; previously, an error of level E_WARNING has been raised instead, and the function returned null.

array_column

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-column.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Objects in columns indicated by index_key parameter will no longer be cast to string and will now throw a TypeError instead.

array_combine

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-combine.php

Version Description
8.0.0 array_combine() will now throw a ValueError if the number of elements for each array is not equal; previously this function returned false instead.

array_diff

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-diff.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function can now be called with only one parameter. Formerly, at least two parameters have been required.

array_diff_assoc

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-diff-assoc.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function can now be called with only one parameter. Formerly, at least two parameters have been required.

array_diff_key

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-diff-key.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function can now be called with only one parameter. Formerly, at least two parameters have been required.

array_fill

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-fill.php

Version Description
8.0.0 array_fill() now throws a ValueError if count is out of range; previously E_WARNING was raised, and the function returned false.

array_filter

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-filter.php

Version Description
8.0.0 callback is nullable now.
8.0.0 If callback expects a parameter to be passed by reference, this function will now emit an E_WARNING.

array_intersect

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-intersect.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function can now be called with only one parameter. Formerly, at least two parameters have been required.

array_intersect_assoc

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-intersect-assoc.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function can now be called with only one parameter. Formerly, at least two parameters have been required.

array_intersect_key

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-intersect-key.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function can now be called with only one parameter. Formerly, at least two parameters have been required.

array_key_exists

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-key-exists.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The key parameter now accepts bool, float, int, null, resource, and string as arguments.

array_map

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-map.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If callback expects a parameter to be passed by reference, this function will now emit an E_WARNING.

array_merge

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-merge.php

Version Description
7.4.0 This function can now be called without any parameter. Formerly, at least one parameter has been required.

array_merge_recursive

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-merge-recursive.php

Version Description
7.4.0 This function can now be called without any parameter. Formerly, at least one parameter has been required.

array_pad

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-pad.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Prior to 8.3, only 1048576 elements could be added at once. Now it is limited only by the maximum size of an array instead.

array_product

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-product.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now emits E_WARNING when array values cannot be converted to int or float. Previously arrays and objects where ignored whilst every other value was cast to int. Moreover, objects that define a numeric cast (e.g. GMP) are now cast instead of ignored.

array_push

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-push.php

Version Description
7.3.0 This function can now be called with only one parameter. Formerly, at least two parameters have been required.

array_rand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-rand.php

Version Description
8.0.0 array_rand() now throws a ValueError if num is out of range; previously an E_WARNING was raised, and the function returned null.
8.0.0 array_rand() now throws a ValueError if array is empty; previously an E_WARNING was raised, and the function returned null.
7.1.0 The internal randomization algorithm has been changed to use the » Mersenne Twister Random Number Generator instead of the libc rand function.

array_reduce

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-reduce.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If callback expects a parameter to be passed by reference, this function will now emit an E_WARNING.

array_splice

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-splice.php

Version Description
8.0.0 length is nullable now.

array_sum

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-sum.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now emits E_WARNING when array values cannot be converted to int or float. Previously arrays and objects where ignored whilst every other value was cast to int. Moreover, objects that define a numeric cast (e.g. GMP) are now cast instead of ignored.

array_unique

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-unique.php

Version Description
7.2.0 If flags is SORT_STRING, formerly array has been copied and non-unique elements have been removed (without packing the array afterwards), but now a new array is built by adding the unique elements. This can result in different numeric indexes.

array_unshift

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-unshift.php

Version Description
7.3.0 This function can now be called with only one parameter. Formerly, at least two parameters have been required.

array_walk

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.array-walk.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If callback expects the second or third parameter to be passed by reference, this function will now emit an E_WARNING.

arsort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.arsort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

asort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.asort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

assert

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.assert.php

Version Description
8.3.0 All assert. INI settings have been deprecated.
8.0.0 assert() will no longer evaluate string arguments, instead they will be treated like any other argument. assert($a == $b) should be used instead of assert('$a == $b'). The assert.quiet_eval php.ini directive and the ASSERT_QUIET_EVAL constant have also been removed, as they would no longer have any effect.
8.0.0 If description is an instance of Throwable, the object is thrown if the assertion fails, regardless of the value of assert.exception.
8.0.0 If description is an instance of Throwable, no user callback is called even if it set.
8.0.0 Declaring a function called assert() inside a namespace is no longer allowed, and issues E_COMPILE_ERROR.
7.3.0 Declaring a function called assert() inside a namespace became deprecated. Such declaration now emits an E_DEPRECATED.
7.2.0 Usage of a string as the assertion became deprecated. It now emits an E_DEPRECATED notice when both assert.active and zend.assertions are set to 1.

assert_options

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.assert-options.php

Version Description
8.3.0 assert_option() is now deprecated.
8.0.0 If option is not a valid option, a ValueError is now thrown. Previously false was returned.

base_convert

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.base-convert.php

Version Description
7.4.0 Passing invalid characters will now generate a deprecation notice. The result will still be computed as if the invalid characters did not exist.

bcadd

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bcadd.php

Version Description
8.0.0 scale is now nullable.

bccomp

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bccomp.php

Version Description
8.0.0 scale is now nullable.

bcdiv

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bcdiv.php

Version Description
8.0.0 scale is now nullable.

bcmod

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bcmod.php

Version Description
8.0.0 scale is now nullable.
7.2.0 num1 and num2 are no longer truncated to integer, so now the behavior of bcmod() follows fmod() rather than the % operator.
7.2.0 The scale parameter was added.

bcmul

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bcmul.php

Version Description
8.0.0 scale is now nullable.
7.3.0 bcmul() now returns numbers with the requested scale. Formerly, the returned numbers may have omitted trailing decimal zeroes.

bcpow

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bcpow.php

Version Description
7.3.0 bcpow() now returns numbers with the requested scale. Formerly, the returned numbers may have omitted trailing decimal zeroes.

bcpowmod

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bcpowmod.php

Version Description
8.0.0 scale is now nullable.

bcscale

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bcscale.php

Version Description
8.0.0 scale is now nullable.
7.3.0 bcscale() can now be used to get the current scale factor; when used as setter, it now returns the old scale value. Formerly, scale was mandatory, and bcscale() always returned true.

bcsqrt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bcsqrt.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If num is not a well-formed BCMath numeric string, or less than 0, a ValueError is thrown. Previously, E_WARNING was raised instead.
8.0.0 scale now needs to be between 0 and 2147483647; previously, negative scales have been silently treated as 0.
8.0.0 scale is now nullable.

bcsub

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bcsub.php

Version Description
8.0.0 scale is now nullable.

bindec

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bindec.php

Version Description
7.4.0 Passing invalid characters will now generate a deprecation notice. The result will still be computed as if the invalid characters did not exist.

bindtextdomain

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bindtextdomain.php

Version Description
8.0.3 directory is nullable now. Previously, it was not possible to retrieve the currently set directory.

bind_textdomain_codeset

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bind-textdomain-codeset.php

Version Description
8.0.3 codeset is nullable now. Previously, it was not possible to retrieve the currently set encoding.

bzdecompress

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bzdecompress.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The type of use_less_memory has been changed from int to bool. Previously, the default value was 0.

bzwrite

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.bzwrite.php

Version Description
8.0.0 length is nullable now.

call_user_func_array

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.call-user-func-array.php

Version Description
8.0.0 args keys will now be interpreted as parameter names, instead of being silently ignored.

ceil

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.ceil.php

Version Description
8.0.0 num no longer accepts internal objects which support numeric conversion.

chr

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.chr.php

Version Description
7.4.0 The function no longer silently accepts unsupported codepoints, and casts these to 0.

class_alias

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.class-alias.php

Version Description
8.3.0 class_alias() now supports creating an alias of an internal class.

Collectable::isGarbage

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/collectable.isgarbage.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

compact

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.compact.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If a given string references an unset variable, an E_WARNING level error is now issued.
7.3.0 compact() now issues an E_NOTICE level error if a given string refers to an unset variable. Formerly, such strings have been silently skipped.

com_event_sink

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.com-event-sink.php

Version Description
8.0.0 sink_interface is nullable now.

com_get_active_object

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.com-get-active-object.php

Version Description
8.0.0 codepage is nullable now.

constant

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.constant.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If the constant is not defined, constant() now throws an Error exception; previously an E_WARNING was generated, and null was returned.

convert_uuencode

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.convert-uuencode.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Prior to this version, trying to convert an empty string returned false for no particular reason.

count

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.count.php

Version Description
8.0.0 count() will now throw TypeError on invalid countable types passed to the value parameter.
7.2.0 count() will now yield a warning on invalid countable types passed to the value parameter.

count_chars

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.count-chars.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Prior to this version, the function returned false on failure.

crypt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.crypt.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The salt is no longer optional.

cubrid_bind

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.cubrid-bind.php

Version Description
8.3.1 Added BLOB/CLOB data types support.

cubrid_col_size

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.cubrid-col-size.php

Version Description
8.3.1 Change return value: when process is unsuccessful, return false, not -1.

cubrid_execute

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.cubrid-execute.php

Version Description
8.4.0 Add new option CUBRID_EXEC_QUERY_ALL.

cubrid_get_db_parameter

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.cubrid-get-db-parameter.php

Version Description
8.4.0 Change LOCK_TIMEOUT to PARAM_LOCK_TIMEOUT, and MAX_STRING_LENGTH to PARAM_MAX_STRING_LENGTH in result.

cubrid_insert_id

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.cubrid-insert-id.php

Version Description
8.4.0 Change the return value from an array to string; Remove the first parameter class_name.

cubrid_lob_size

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.cubrid-lob-size.php

Version Description
8.4.0 Change return value type from int to string.

cubrid_schema

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.cubrid-schema.php

Version Description
8.3.1 Change return value: when process is unsuccessful, return false, not -1.

CURLFile::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/curlfile.construct.php

Version Description
8.0.0 mime_type and posted_filename are nullable now; previously their default was 0.

curl_close

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-close.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_copy_handle

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-copy-handle.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.
8.0.0 On success, this function returns a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was returned.

curl_errno

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-errno.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_error

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-error.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_escape

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-escape.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_exec

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-exec.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_getinfo

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-getinfo.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Introduced CURLINFO_CAINFO and CURLINFO_CAPATH.
8.2.0 Introduced CURLINFO_PROXY_ERROR, CURLINFO_REFERER, CURLINFO_RETRY_AFTER.
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.
8.0.0 option is nullable now; previously, the default was 0.
7.3.0 Introduced CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_DOWNLOAD_T, CURLINFO_CONTENT_LENGTH_UPLOAD_T, CURLINFO_HTTP_VERSION, CURLINFO_PROTOCOL, CURLINFO_PROXY_SSL_VERIFYRESULT, CURLINFO_SCHEME, CURLINFO_SIZE_DOWNLOAD_T, CURLINFO_SIZE_UPLOAD_T, CURLINFO_SPEED_DOWNLOAD_T, CURLINFO_SPEED_UPLOAD_T, CURLINFO_APPCONNECT_TIME_T, CURLINFO_CONNECT_TIME_T, CURLINFO_FILETIME_T, CURLINFO_NAMELOOKUP_TIME_T, CURLINFO_PRETRANSFER_TIME_T, CURLINFO_REDIRECT_TIME_T, CURLINFO_STARTTRANSFER_TIME_T, CURLINFO_TOTAL_TIME_T.

curl_init

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-init.php

Version Description
8.0.0 On success, this function returns a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was returned.
8.0.0 url is nullable now.

curl_multi_add_handle

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-multi-add-handle.php

Version Description
8.0.0 multi_handle expects a CurlMultiHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_multi_close

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-multi-close.php

Version Description
8.0.0 multi_handle expects a CurlMultiHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_multi_errno

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-multi-errno.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The function no longer returns false on failure.
8.0.0 multi_handle expects a CurlMultiHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_multi_exec

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-multi-exec.php

Version Description
8.0.0 multi_handle expects a CurlMultiHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_multi_getcontent

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-multi-getcontent.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_multi_info_read

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-multi-info-read.php

Version Description
8.0.0 multi_handle expects a CurlMultiHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

Version Description
8.0.0 On success, this function returns a CurlMultiHandle instance now; previously, a resource was returned.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-multi-remove-handle.php

Version Description
8.0.0 multi_handle expects a CurlMultiHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_multi_select

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-multi-select.php

Version Description
8.0.0 multi_handle expects a CurlMultiHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_multi_setopt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-multi-setopt.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Introduced CURLMOPT_MAX_CONCURRENT_STREAMS.
8.0.0 multi_handle expects a CurlMultiHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.
7.1.0 Introduced CURLMOPT_PUSHFUNCTION.
7.0.7 Introduced CURLMOPT_CHUNK_LENGTH_PENALTY_SIZE, CURLMOPT_CONTENT_LENGTH_PENALTY_SIZE, CURLMOPT_MAX_HOST_CONNECTIONS, CURLMOPT_MAX_PIPELINE_LENGTH and CURLMOPT_MAX_TOTAL_CONNECTIONS.

curl_pause

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-pause.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_reset

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-reset.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_setopt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-setopt.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.
7.3.15, 7.4.3 Introduced CURLOPT_HTTP09_ALLOWED.
7.3.0 Introduced CURLOPT_ABSTRACT_UNIX_SOCKET, CURLOPT_KEEP_SENDING_ON_ERROR, CURLOPT_PRE_PROXY, CURLOPT_PROXY_CAINFO, CURLOPT_PROXY_CAPATH, CURLOPT_PROXY_CRLFILE, CURLOPT_PROXY_KEYPASSWD, CURLOPT_PROXY_PINNEDPUBLICKEY, CURLOPT_PROXY_SSLCERT, CURLOPT_PROXY_SSLCERTTYPE, CURLOPT_PROXY_SSL_CIPHER_LIST, CURLOPT_PROXY_SSLKEY, CURLOPT_PROXY_SSLKEYTYPE, CURLOPT_PROXY_SSL_OPTIONS, CURLOPT_PROXY_SSL_VERIFYHOST, CURLOPT_PROXY_SSL_VERIFYPEER, CURLOPT_PROXY_SSLVERSION, CURLOPT_PROXY_TLSAUTH_PASSWORD, CURLOPT_PROXY_TLSAUTH_TYPE, CURLOPT_PROXY_TLSAUTH_USERNAME, CURLOPT_SOCKS5_AUTH, CURLOPT_SUPPRESS_CONNECT_HEADERS, CURLOPT_DISALLOW_USERNAME_IN_URL, CURLOPT_DNS_SHUFFLE_ADDRESSES, CURLOPT_HAPPY_EYEBALLS_TIMEOUT_MS, CURLOPT_HAPROXYPROTOCOL, CURLOPT_PROXY_TLS13_CIPHERS, CURLOPT_SSH_COMPRESSION, CURLOPT_TIMEVALUE_LARGE and CURLOPT_TLS13_CIPHERS.
7.0.7 Introduced CURL_HTTP_VERSION_2, CURL_HTTP_VERSION_2_PRIOR_KNOWLEDGE, CURL_HTTP_VERSION_2TLS, CURL_REDIR_POST_301, CURL_REDIR_POST_302, CURL_REDIR_POST_303, CURL_REDIR_POST_ALL, CURL_VERSION_KERBEROS5, CURL_VERSION_PSL, CURL_VERSION_UNIX_SOCKETS, CURLAUTH_NEGOTIATE, CURLAUTH_NTLM_WB, CURLFTP_CREATE_DIR, CURLFTP_CREATE_DIR_NONE, CURLFTP_CREATE_DIR_RETRY, CURLHEADER_SEPARATE, CURLHEADER_UNIFIED, CURLMOPT_CHUNK_LENGTH_PENALTY_SIZE, CURLMOPT_CONTENT_LENGTH_PENALTY_SIZE, CURLMOPT_MAX_HOST_CONNECTIONS, CURLMOPT_MAX_PIPELINE_LENGTH, CURLMOPT_MAX_TOTAL_CONNECTIONS, CURLOPT_CONNECT_TO, CURLOPT_DEFAULT_PROTOCOL, CURLOPT_DNS_INTERFACE, CURLOPT_DNS_LOCAL_IP4, CURLOPT_DNS_LOCAL_IP6, CURLOPT_EXPECT_100_TIMEOUT_MS, CURLOPT_HEADEROPT, CURLOPT_LOGIN_OPTIONS, CURLOPT_PATH_AS_IS, CURLOPT_PINNEDPUBLICKEY, CURLOPT_PIPEWAIT, CURLOPT_PROXY_SERVICE_NAME, CURLOPT_PROXYHEADER, CURLOPT_SASL_IR, CURLOPT_SERVICE_NAME, CURLOPT_SSL_ENABLE_ALPN, CURLOPT_SSL_ENABLE_NPN, CURLOPT_SSL_FALSESTART, CURLOPT_SSL_VERIFYSTATUS, CURLOPT_STREAM_WEIGHT, CURLOPT_TCP_FASTOPEN, CURLOPT_TFTP_NO_OPTIONS, CURLOPT_UNIX_SOCKET_PATH, CURLOPT_XOAUTH2_BEARER, CURLPROTO_SMB, CURLPROTO_SMBS, CURLPROXY_HTTP_1_0, CURLSSH_AUTH_AGENT and CURLSSLOPT_NO_REVOKE.

curl_setopt_array

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-setopt-array.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_share_close

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-share-close.php

Version Description
8.0.0 share_handle expects a CurlShareHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_share_errno

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-share-errno.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The function no longer returns false on failure.
8.0.0 share_handle expects a CurlShareHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_share_init

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-share-init.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function returns a CurlShareHandle instance now; previously, a resource was returned.

curl_share_setopt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-share-setopt.php

Version Description
8.0.0 share_handle expects a CurlShareHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_unescape

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-unescape.php

Version Description
8.0.0 handle expects a CurlHandle instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

curl_version

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.curl-version.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The optional age parameter has been removed.
7.4.0 The optional age parameter has been deprecated; if a value is passed, it is ignored.

current

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.current.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Calling this function on objects is deprecated. Either convert the object to an array using get_mangled_object_vars() first, or use the methods provided by a class that implements Iterator, such as ArrayIterator, instead.
7.4.0 Instances of SPL classes are now treated like empty objects that have no properties instead of calling the Iterator method with the same name as this function.

date

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.date.php

Version Description
8.0.0 timestamp is nullable now.

DateInterval::createFromDateString

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/dateinterval.createfromdatestring.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Only the from_string and date_string properties will be visible when a DateInterval is created with this method.

DateInterval::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/dateinterval.construct.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now throws DateMalformedIntervalStringException instead of Exception.
8.2.0 Only the y to f, invert, and days will be visible, including a new from_string boolean property.
8.0.0 W can be combined with D.

DatePeriod::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/dateperiod.construct.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now throws DateMalformedPeriodStringException instead of Exception.
8.2.0 The DatePeriod::INCLUDE_END_DATE constant has been added.
7.2.19, 7.3.6, 7.4.0 recurrences must be greater than 0 now.

DateTime::createFromFormat

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetime.createfromformat.php

Version Description
8.0.21, 8.1.8, 8.2.0 Now throws ValueError when NULL-bytes are passed into datetime, which previously was silently ignored.

DateTime::createFromImmutable

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetime.createfromimmutable.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The method returns an instance of the currently invoked class now. Previously, it created a new instance of DateTime.

DateTime::modify

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetime.modify.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now throws DateMalformedStringException with DateTime::modify() if an invalid string is passed, instead of a warning. date_modify() has not been changed.

DateTime::setTime

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetime.settime.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The behaviour with double existing hours (during the fall-back DST transition) changed. Previously PHP would pick the second occurrence (after the DST transition), instead of the first occurrence (before DST transition).
7.1.0 The microsecond parameter was added.

DateTime::sub

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetime.sub.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now throws a DateInvalidOperationException with DateTime::sub(), instead of a warning when an unsupported operation is attempted. date_sub() has not been changed.

DateTime::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetime.construct.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now throws DateMalformedStringException if an invalid string is passed, instead of Exception.

DateTimeImmutable::createFromFormat

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetimeimmutable.createfromformat.php

Version Description
8.2.9 The (space) specifier now also supports NBSP (U+A0) and NNBSP (U+202F) characters.
8.2.0 The X and x format specifiers have been added.
8.0.21, 8.1.8, 8.2.0 Now throws ValueError when NULL-bytes are passed into datetime, which previously was silently ignored.
7.3.0 The v format specifier has been added.

DateTimeImmutable::createFromMutable

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetimeimmutable.createfrommutable.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The method returns an instance of the currently invoked class now. Previously, it created a new instance of DateTimeImmutable.

DateTimeImmutable::getLastErrors

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetimeimmutable.getlasterrors.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Before PHP 8.2.0, this function did not return false when there were no warnings or errors. Instead, it would always return the documented array structure.

DateTimeImmutable::modify

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetimeimmutable.modify.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now throws DateMalformedStringException if an invalid string is passed, instead of a warning.

DateTimeImmutable::setTime

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetimeimmutable.settime.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The behaviour with double existing hours (during the fall-back DST transition) changed. Previously PHP would pick the second occurrence (after the DST transition), instead of the first occurrence (before DST transition).
7.1.0 The microsecond parameter was added.

DateTimeImmutable::sub

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetimeimmutable.sub.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now throws a DateInvalidOperationException instead of a warning when an unsupported operation is attempted.

DateTimeImmutable::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetimeimmutable.construct.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now throws DateMalformedStringException if an invalid string is passed, instead of Exception.
7.1.0 From now on microseconds are filled with actual value. Not with '00000'.

DateTimeInterface::format

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetime.format.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The format characters X and x have been added.
8.0.0 The format character p has been added.

DateTimeInterface::getTimestamp

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetime.gettimestamp.php

Version Description
8.3.0 The out-of-range exception is now DateRangeError.
8.0.0 These functions no longer return false on failure.

DateTimeZone::listIdentifiers

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetimezone.listidentifiers.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Prior to this version, false was returned on failure.
7.1.0 countryCode is nullable now.

DateTimeZone::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/datetimezone.construct.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Invalid values now return a DateInvalidTimeZoneException instead of a generic Exception.

date_parse

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.date-parse.php

Version Description
7.2.0 The zone element of the returned array represents seconds instead of minutes now, and its sign is inverted. For instance -120 is now 7200.

date_parse_from_format

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.date-parse-from-format.php

Version Description
8.0.21, 8.1.8, 8.2.0 Now throws ValueError when NULL-bytes are passed into datetime, which previously was silently ignored.
7.2.0 The zone element of the returned array represents seconds instead of minutes now, and its sign is inverted. For instance -120 is now 7200.

date_sunrise

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.date-sunrise.php

Version Description
8.1.0 This function has been deprecated in favor of date_sun_info().
8.0.0 latitude, longitude, zenith and utcOffset are nullable now.

date_sunset

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.date-sunset.php

Version Description
8.1.0 This function has been deprecated in favor of date_sun_info().
8.0.0 latitude, longitude, zenith and utcOffset are nullable now.

date_sun_info

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.date-sun-info.php

Version Description
7.2.0 The calculation was fixed with regards to local midnight instead of local noon, which changes the results slightly.

db2_pconnect

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.db2-pconnect.php

Version Description
ibm_db2 1.9.0 Active transactions within a persistent connection will be rolled back at the end of each request.
ibm_db2 1.8.0 The i5_libl option is available for i5/OS users.
ibm_db2 1.7.0 The trustedcontext option is available.
ibm_db2 1.5.1 The i5_lib, i5_naming, i5_commit, i5_query_optimize, i5_dbcs_alloc, i5_date_fmt, i5_date_sep, i5_time_fmt, i5_time_sep and i5_decimal_sep options are available for i5/OS users.

dba_fetch

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.dba-fetch.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling dba_fetch() with dba as the 3rd argument is now deprecated.
8.2.0 dba_fetch()'s optional skip argument is now at the end in line with PHP userland semantics. The previously overloaded signature is still accepted but discouraged.

dba_open

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.dba-open.php

Version Description
8.2.0 flags is added.
8.2.0 handler is now nullable.
7.3.14, 7.4.2 The lmdb driver now supports an additional map_size parameter.

dba_popen

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.dba-popen.php

Version Description
8.2.0 flags is added.
8.1.0 handler is now nullable.
7.3.14, 7.4.2 The lmdb driver now supports an additional map_size parameter.

define

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.define.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Passing true to case_insensitive now emits an E_WARNING. Passing false is still allowed.
7.3.0 case_insensitive has been deprecated and will be removed in version 8.0.0.
7.0.0 array values are allowed.

deflate_add

Version Description
8.0.0 context expects a DeflateContext instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

deflate_init

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.deflate-init.php

Version Description
8.0.0 On success, this function returns a DeflateContext instance now; previously, a resource was returned.

Version Description
8.0.0 context is now nullable.

Version Description

Version Description

DOMCharacterData::after

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/domcharacterdata.after.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling this method on a node without a parent is now a no-op to align the behaviour with the DOM specification. Previously this threw a DOMException with code DOM_HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR.
8.3.0 Calling this method on a node without an owner document now works. Previously this threw a DOMException with code DOM_HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR.

Version Description
8.3.0 This function now has a tentative true return type.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/domchildnode.replacewith.php

Version Description

DOMDocument::append

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/domdocument.append.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling this method on a node without an owner document now works. Previously this threw a DOMException with code DOM_HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR.

DOMDocument::createAttributeNS

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/domdocument.createattributens.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling this method without specifying a prefix will now choose a prefix instead of assuming the default namespace. Previously this would create an attribute without a prefix and incorrectly apply the namespace to the owner element because default namespaces don't apply on attributes.
8.3.0 Calling this method using a prefix that was already declared on the owner element with a different namespace URI will now change the new prefix to avoid creating namespace conflicts. This aligns the behaviour with the DOM specification. Previously this threw a DOMException with code DOM_NAMESPACE_ERR.

DOMDocument::createComment

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/domdocument.createcomment.php

Version Description
8.1.0 In case of an error, a DomException is thrown now. Previously, false was returned.

DOMDocument::createDocumentFragment

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/domdocument.createdocumentfragment.php

Version Description
8.1.0 In case of an error, a DomException is thrown now. Previously, false was returned.

DOMDocument::createTextNode

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/domdocument.createtextnode.php

Version Description
8.1.0 In case of an error, a DomException is thrown now. Previously, false was returned.

Version Description
8.0.3 namespace is nullable now.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/domparentnode.prepend.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling this method on a node without an owner document now works. Previously this threw a DOMException with code DOM_HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR.

DOMParentNode::replaceChildren

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/domparentnode.replacechildren.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling this method on a node without an owner document now works. Previously this threw a DOMException with code DOM_HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR.

dom_import_simplexml

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.dom-import-simplexml.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns null on failure.

easter_date

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.easter-date.php

Version Description
8.3.0 On 64-bit systems, the year parameter now accepts values within the range of 1970 to 2,000,000,000.
8.0.0 year is nullable now.
8.0.0 A ValueError is now thrown when year is outside the allowed range. Previously, an E_WARNING was raised and the function returned false.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.easter-days.php

Version Description
8.0.0 year is nullable now.

8.0.0 Prior to this version, the function returned false on failure.

end

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.end.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Calling this function on objects is deprecated. Either convert the object to an array using get_mangled_object_vars() first, or use the methods provided by a class that implements Iterator, such as ArrayIterator, instead.
7.4.0 Instances of SPL classes are now treated like empty objects that have no properties instead of calling the Iterator method with the same name as this function.

Error::__clone

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/error.clone.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Error::__clone() is no longer final.

ErrorException::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/errorexception.construct.php

Version Description
8.0.0 filename and line are nullable now. Previously, their defaults were __FILE__ and __LINE__, respectively.

error_log

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.error-log.php

Version Description
8.0.0 destination and additional_headers are now nullable.

error_reporting

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.error-reporting.php

Version Description
8.0.0 error_level is nullable now.

EventBuffer::appendFrom

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/eventbuffer.appendfrom.php

Version Description
PECL event 1.6.0 Renamed EventBuffer::appendFrom()(the old method name) to EventBuffer::appendFrom().

EventBuffer::read

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/eventbuffer.read.php

Version Description
PECL event 1.6.0 Renamed EventBuffer::read()(the old method name) to EventBuffer::read(). EventBuffer::read() now takes only max_bytes argument; returns string instead of integer.

EventBufferEvent::createPair

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/eventbufferevent.createpair.php

Version Description
PECL event 1.9.0 Method made static.

EventDnsBase::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/eventdnsbase.construct.php

Version Description
PECL event 3.1.3 If initialize has a type other than int|bool, a TypeError is thrown.
PECL event 3.1.0RC1 The type of the initialize parameter has been changed from bool to mixed. The value can be either bool (preserving the previous meaning) or one of the following constants: EventDnsBase::DISABLE_WHEN_INACTIVE, EventDnsBase::INITIALIZE_NAMESERVERS, or EventDnsBase::NAMESERVERS_NO_DEFAULT.

Exception::__clone

Version Description
8.1.0 Exception::__clone() is no longer final.

exec

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.exec.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If command is empty or contains null bytes, exec() now throws a ValueError. Previously it emitted an E_WARNING and returned false.

exif_imagetype

Version Description
7.1.0 Added WebP support.
8.1.0 Added AVIF support.

exif_read_data

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.exif-read-data.php

Version Description
8.0.0 required_sections is nullable now.
7.2.0 The file parameter now supports both local files and stream resources.
7.2.0

Support for the following EXIF formats were added:

  • Samsung
  • DJI
  • Panasonic
  • Sony
  • Pentax
  • Minolta
  • Sigma/Foveon
  • AGFA
  • Kyocera
  • Ricoh
  • Epson

Version Description
7.2.0 The file parameter now supports both local files and stream resources.

expect_expectl

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.expect-expectl.php

Version Description
PECL expect 0.2.1 Prior to version 0.2.1, in match parameter a match string was returned, not an array of match substrings.

explode

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.explode.php

Version Description
8.0.0 explode() will now throw ValueError when separator parameter is given an empty string (""). Previously, explode() returned false instead.

Version Description
4.3.0 Support for arrays and the which parameter were added.

Version Description

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling FFI::type() statically is now deprecated.

fgetcsv

Version Description
8.0.0 length is now nullable.
7.4.0 The escape parameter now also accepts an empty string to disable the proprietary escape mechanism.

FilesystemIterator::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/filesystemiterator.construct.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Prior to PHP 8.2.0, FilesystemIterator::SKIP_DOTS was always set and could not be removed.
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError if directory is an empty string; previously it threw a RuntimeException.

Version Description
8.0.0 length is nullable now.
7.1.0 Support for negative offsets has been added.

Version Description

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.finfo-open.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Returns an finfo instance now; previously, a resource was returned.
8.0.3 magic_database is nullable now.

floatval

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.floatval.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The error level when converting from object was changed from E_NOTICE to E_WARNING.

floor

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.floor.php

Version Description
8.0.0 num no longer accepts internal objects which support numeric conversion.

fopen

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.fopen.php

Version Description
7.0.16, 7.1.2 The 'e' option was added.

fprintf

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.fprintf.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns false on failure.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if the number of arguments is zero; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [width] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [precision] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ArgumentCountError when less arguments are given than required; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.

fputcsv

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.fputcsv.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The optional eol parameter has been added.
7.4.0 The escape parameter now also accepts an empty string to disable the proprietary escape mechanism.

8.0.0 timeout is nullable now.

Version Description

getallheaders

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.getallheaders.php

Version Description
7.3.0 This function became available in the FPM SAPI.

getdate

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.getdate.php

Version Description
8.0.0 timestamp is nullable now.

getenv

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.getenv.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The name is now nullable.
7.1.0 The name can now be omitted to retrieve an associative array of all environment variables.
7.0.9 The local_only parameter has been added.

getimagesize

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.getimagesize.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Now returns the actual image dimensions, bits and channels of AVIF images; previously, the dimensions were reported as 0x0, and bits and channels were not reported at all.
7.1.0 Added WebP support.

getopt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.getopt.php

Version Description
7.1.0 Added the rest_index parameter.

getrusage

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.getrusage.php

Version Description
7.0.0 This function is now supported on Windows.

gettype

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.gettype.php

Version Description
7.2.0 Closed resources are now reported as 'resource (closed)'. Previously the returned value for closed resources were 'unknown type'.

get_called_class

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-called-class.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Calling this function from outside a class, will now throw an Error. Previously, an E_WARNING was raised and the function returned false.

get_class

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-class.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling get_class() without an argument now emits an E_DEPRECATED warning; previously, calling this function inside a class returned the name of that class.
8.0.0 Calling this function from outside a class, without any arguments, will now throw an Error. Previously, an E_WARNING was raised and the function returned false.
7.2.0 Prior to this version the default value for object was null and it had the same effect as not passing any value. Now null has been removed as the default value for object, and is no longer a valid input.

get_class_methods

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-class-methods.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The object_or_class parameter now only accepts objects or valid class names.

get_declared_classes

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-declared-classes.php

Version Description
7.4.0 Previously get_declared_classes() always returned parent classes before child classes. This is no longer the case. No particular order is guaranteed for the get_declared_classes() return value.

get_defined_functions

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-defined-functions.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The default value of the exclude_disabled parameter has been changed from false to true.
7.0.15, 7.1.1 The exclude_disabled parameter has been added.

get_headers

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-headers.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The associative has been changed from int to bool.
7.1.0 The context parameter was added.

get_html_translation_table

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-html-translation-table.php

Version Description
8.1.0 flags changed from ENT_COMPAT to ENT_QUOTES | ENT_SUBSTITUTE | ENT_HTML401.

get_magic_quotes_gpc

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-magic-quotes-gpc.php

Version Description
7.4.0 This function has been deprecated.

get_magic_quotes_runtime

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-magic-quotes-runtime.php

Version Description
7.4.0 This function has been deprecated.

get_parent_class

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-parent-class.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling get_parent_class() without an argument now emits an E_DEPRECATED warning; previously, calling this function inside a class returned the name of that class.
8.0.0 The object_or_class parameter now only accepts objects or valid class names.

get_resources

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.get-resources.php

Version Description
8.0.0 type is nullable now.

GlobIterator::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/globiterator.construct.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError if directory is an empty string; previously it threw a RuntimeException.

gmdate

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.gmdate.php

Version Description
8.0.0 timestamp is nullable now.

gmmktime

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.gmmktime.php

Version Description
8.0.0 hour is no longer optional. If you need a Unix timestamp, use time().
8.0.0 minute, second, month, day and year are nullable now.

gmp_binomial

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.gmp-binomial.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns false on failure.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.gmp-export.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns false on failure.

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns false on failure.

gmp_random_seed

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.gmp-random-seed.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If seed is invalid, gmp_random_seed() now throws a ValueError. Previously it emitted an E_WARNING and returned false.

Version Description
8.0.0 timestamp is nullable now.

grapheme_substr

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.grapheme-substr.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The function now consistently clamps out-of-bounds offsets to the string boundary. Previously, false was returned instead of the empty string in some cases.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.gzgets.php

Version Description
8.0.0 length is nullable now; previously, the default was 1024.

gzread

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.gzread.php

Version Description
7.4.0 This functions returns false on failure now; previously 0 was returned.

gzwrite

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.gzwrite.php

Version Description
8.0.0 length is nullable now; previously, the default was 0.
7.4.0 This functions returns false on failure now; previously 0 was returned.

hash

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.hash.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The options parameter has been added.
8.0.0 hash() now throws a ValueError exception if algo is unknown; previously, false was returned instead.

hash_algos

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.hash-algos.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Support for MurmurHash3 and xxHash algorithms has been added.
7.4.0 Support for crc32c has been added.
7.1.0 Support for sha512/224, sha512/256, sha3-224, sha3-256, sha3-384 and sha3-512 has been added.

hash_copy

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.hash-copy.php

Version Description
7.2.0 Accept and return HashContext instead of resource.

hash_file

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.hash-file.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The options parameter has been added.

hash_final

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.hash-final.php

Version Description
7.2.0 Accept HashContext instead of resource.

hash_hkdf

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.hash-hkdf.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError exception on error. Previously, false was returned and an E_WARNING message was emitted.

hash_hmac

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.hash-hmac.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError exception if algo is unknown or is a non-cryptographic hash function; previously, false was returned instead.
7.2.0 Usage of non-cryptographic hash functions (adler32, crc32, crc32b, fnv132, fnv1a32, fnv164, fnv1a64, joaat) was disabled.

hash_hmac_file

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.hash-hmac-file.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError exception if algo is unknown or is a non-cryptographic hash function; previously, false was returned instead.
7.2.0 Usage of non-cryptographic hash functions (adler32, crc32, crc32b, fnv132, fnv1a32, fnv164, fnv1a64, joaat) was disabled.

hash_init

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.hash-init.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The options parameter has been added.
8.0.0 Now throws an ValueError exception if the algo is unknown or is a non-cryptographic hash function, or if key is empty. Previously, false was returned and an E_WARNING message was emitted.
7.2.0 Usage of non-cryptographic hash functions (adler32, crc32, crc32b, fnv132, fnv1a32, fnv164, fnv1a64, joaat) with HASH_HMAC was disabled.
7.2.0 Return HashContext instead of resource.

hash_pbkdf2

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.hash-pbkdf2.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError exception on error. Previously, false was returned and an E_WARNING message was emitted.
7.2.0 Usage of non-cryptographic hash functions (adler32, crc32, crc32b, fnv132, fnv1a32, fnv164, fnv1a64, joaat) was disabled.

Version Description
7.2.0 Accept HashContext instead of resource.

7.2.0 Accept HashContext instead of resource.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.idate.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Adds the N (ISO-8601 day of the week) and o (ISO-8601 year) format characters.
8.0.0 timestamp is nullable now.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.idn-to-ascii.php

Version Description
7.4.0 The default value of variant is now INTL_IDNA_VARIANT_UTS46 instead of the deprecated INTL_IDNA_VARIANT_2003.
7.2.0 INTL_IDNA_VARIANT_2003 has been deprecated; use INTL_IDNA_VARIANT_UTS46 instead.

imagecrop

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.imagecrop.php

Version Description

8.0.0 On success, this function returns a GDImage instance now; previously, a resource was returned.

imagecropauto

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.imagecropauto.php

Version Description
8.0.0 image expects a GdImage instance now; previously, a valid gd resource was expected.
8.0.0 On success, this function returns a GDImage instance now; previously, a resource was returned.
7.4.0 The behavior of imagecropauto() in the bundled libgd has been synced with that of system libgd: IMG_CROP_DEFAULT no longer falls back to IMG_CROP_SIDES and threshold-cropping now uses the same algorithm as system libgd.
7.4.0 The default value of mode has been changed to IMG_CROP_AUTO. Formerly, the default value has been -1 which corresponds to IMG_CROP_DEFAULT, but passing -1 is now deprecated.

Version Description
8.0.5 imageinterlace() returns a bool now; previously it returned an int (non-zero for interlaced images, zero otherwise).
8.0.0 image expects a GdImage instance now; previously, a valid gd resource was expected.
8.0.0 enable expects a bool now; previously it expected an int.

imageistruecolor

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.imageistruecolor.php

Version Description
8.0.0 image expects a GdImage instance now; previously, a valid gd resource was expected.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.imagejpeg.php

Version Description
8.0.0 image expects a GdImage instance now; previously, a valid gd resource was expected.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.imagelayereffect.php

Version Description
8.0.0 image expects a GdImage instance now; previously, a valid gd resource was expected.
7.2.0 Added IMG_EFFECT_MULTIPLY (requires system libgd >= 2.1.1 or the bundled libgd).

8.0.0 image expects a GdImage instance now; previously, a valid gd resource was expected.

Version Description
8.1.0 Returns an GdFont instance now; previously, an int was returned.

Version Description
8.3.0 The unused ignore_transparent has been completely removed.
8.0.0 On success, this function returns a GDImage instance now; previously, a resource was returned.
8.0.0 image expects a GdImage instance now; previously, a valid gd resource was expected.
8.0.0 The unused ignore_transparent expects a bool now; previously it expected an int.

Imagick::adaptiveResizeImage

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/imagick.adaptiveresizeimage.php

Version Description
PECL imagick 2.1.0 Added optional fit parameter.
PECL imagick 2.1.0 This method now supports proportional scaling. Pass zero as either parameter for proportional scaling.

Imagick::blackThresholdImage

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/imagick.blackthresholdimage.php

Version Description
PECL imagick 2.1.0 Now allows a string representing the color as a parameter. Previous versions allow only an ImagickPixel object.

Imagick::borderImage

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/imagick.borderimage.php

Version Description
PECL imagick 2.1.0 Now allows a string representing the color as the first parameter. Previous versions allow only an ImagickPixel object.

Imagick::clone

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/imagick.clone.php

Version Description
PECL imagick 3.1.0 The method was deprecated in favour of the clone keyword.

Imagick::colorFloodfillImage

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/imagick.colorfloodfillimage.php

Version Description
PECL imagick 2.1.0 Now allows a string representing the color as first and third parameter. Previous versions allow only an ImagickPixel object.

Imagick::colorizeImage

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/imagick.colorizeimage.php

Version Description
PECL imagick 2.1.0 Now allows a string representing the color as the first parameter and a float representing the opacity value as the second parameter. Previous versions allow only an ImagickPixel objects.

8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

IntlCalendar::setSkippedWallTimeOption

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/intlcalendar.setskippedwalltimeoption.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

IntlChar::enumCharNames

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/intlchar.enumcharnames.php

Version Description
8.3.0 This method now returns false on failure; previously it returns null.

IntlDateFormatter::create

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/intldateformatter.create.php

Version Description
8.1.0

Parameters dateType and timeType are now optional.

IntlDateFormatter::format

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/intldateformatter.format.php

Version Description
7.1.5 Support for providing general DateTimeInterface objects to the datetime parameter was added. Formerly, only proper DateTime objects were supported.
PECL 3.0.0 Support for providing IntlCalendar objects to the datetime parameter was added.

IntlDateFormatter::setCalendar

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/intldateformatter.setcalendar.php

Version Description
5.5.0/PECL 3.0.0 It became possible to pass an IntlCalendar object.

IntlDateFormatter::setTimeZone

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/intldateformatter.settimezone.php

Version Description
8.3.0 This function now returns true on success; previously it returns null.

IntlTimeZone::getIDForWindowsID

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/intltimezone.getidforwindowsid.php

Version Description
8.0.0 region is now nullable.

intval

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.intval.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The error level when converting from object was changed from E_NOTICE to E_WARNING.

is_countable

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.is-countable.php

Version Description
7.3.0 is_countable() has been added.

is_numeric

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.is-numeric.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Numeric strings ending with whitespace ("42 ") will now return true. Previously, false was returned instead.

is_object

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.is-object.php

Version Description
7.2.0 is_object() now returns true for unserialized objects without a class definition (class of __PHP_Incomplete_Class). Previously false was returned.

iterator_count

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.iterator-count.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The type of iterator has been widened from Traversable to Traversable|array.

iterator_to_array

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.iterator-to-array.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The type of iterator has been widened from Traversable to Traversable|array.

jdtounix

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.jdtounix.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns false on failure, but raises a ValueError instead.
7.3.24, 7.4.12 The upper limit of julian_day has been extended. Previously, it was 2465342 regardless of the architecture.

json_decode

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.json-decode.php

Version Description
7.3.0 JSON_THROW_ON_ERROR flags was added.
7.2.0 associative is nullable now.
7.2.0 JSON_INVALID_UTF8_IGNORE, and JSON_INVALID_UTF8_SUBSTITUTE flags were added.
7.1.0 An empty JSON key ("") can be encoded to the empty object property instead of using a key with value _empty_.

json_encode

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.json-encode.php

Version Description
7.3.0 JSON_THROW_ON_ERROR flags was added.
7.2.0 JSON_INVALID_UTF8_IGNORE, and JSON_INVALID_UTF8_SUBSTITUTE flags were added.
7.1.0 JSON_UNESCAPED_LINE_TERMINATORS flags was added.
7.1.0 serialize_precision is used instead of precision when encoding float values.

key

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.key.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Calling this function on objects is deprecated. Either convert the object to an array using get_mangled_object_vars() first, or use the methods provided by a class that implements Iterator, such as ArrayIterator, instead.
7.4.0 Instances of SPL classes are now treated like empty objects that have no properties instead of calling the Iterator method with the same name as this function.

krsort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.krsort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

ksort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.ksort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

lcfirst

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.lcfirst.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Case conversion no longer depends on the locale set with setlocale(). Only ASCII characters will be converted.

ldap_add

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.ldap-add.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The ldap parameter expects an LDAP\Connection instance now; previously, a valid ldap link resource was expected.
8.0.0 controls is nullable now; previously, it defaulted to [].
7.3.0 Support for controls added

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.ldap-unbind.php

Version Description

levenshtein

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.levenshtein.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Prior to this version, levenshtein() had to be called with either two or five arguments.
8.0.0 Prior to this version, levenshtein() would return -1 if one of the argument strings is longer than 255 characters.

libxml_use_internal_errors

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.libxml-use-internal-errors.php

Version Description
8.0.0 use_errors is nullable now. Previously, its default was false.

LimitIterator::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/limititerator.construct.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError if offset is less than 0; previously it threw a RuntimeException.
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError if limit is less than -1; previously it threw a RuntimeException.

list

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.list.php

Version Description
7.3.0 Support for reference assignments in array destructuring was added.
7.1.0 It is now possible to specify keys in list(). This enables destructuring of arrays with non-integer or non-sequential keys.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/locale.getdisplaylanguage.php

Version Description
8.0.0 displayLocale is nullable now.

Version Description
8.0.0 displayLocale is nullable now.

8.0.0 displayLocale is nullable now.

Version Description

Version Description
7.4.0 defaultLocale is nullable now.

localtime

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.localtime.php

Version Description
8.0.0 timestamp is nullable now.

long2ip

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.long2ip.php

Version Description
7.1.0 The parameter type of ip has been changed from string to int.

mail

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mail.php

Version Description
7.2.0 The additional_headers parameter now also accepts an array.

max

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.max.php

Version Description
8.0.0 max() throws a ValueError on failure now; previously, false was returned and an E_WARNING error was emitted.
8.0.0 As string to number comparisons were changed, max() no longer returns a different value based on the argument order in those cases.

mb_check_encoding

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-check-encoding.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Calling this function with null as value or without argument is deprecated.
8.0.0 value and encoding are nullable now.
7.2.0 This function now also accepts an array as value. Formerly, only strings have been supported.

mb_chr

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-chr.php

Version Description
8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.

mb_convert_case

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-convert-case.php

Version Description
7.3.0 Added support for MB_CASE_FOLD, MB_CASE_UPPER_SIMPLE, MB_CASE_LOWER_SIMPLE, MB_CASE_TITLE_SIMPLE, and MB_CASE_FOLD_SIMPLE as mode.

mb_convert_encoding

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-convert-encoding.php

Version Description
8.2.0 mb_convert_encoding() will no longer return the following non text encodings: "Base64", "QPrint", "UUencode", "HTML entities", "7 bit" and "8 bit".
8.0.0 mb_convert_encoding() will now throw a ValueError when to_encoding is passed an invalid encoding.
8.0.0 mb_convert_encoding() will now throw a ValueError when from_encoding is passed an invalid encoding.
8.0.0 from_encoding is nullable now.
7.2.0 This function now also accepts an array as string. Formerly, only strings have been supported.

mb_convert_kana

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-convert-kana.php

Version Description
8.2.0 A ValueError is now thrown if the combination of different modes is invalid.
8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.

mb_decode_numericentity

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-decode-numericentity.php

Version Description
8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.

mb_detect_encoding

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-detect-encoding.php

Version Description
8.2.0 mb_detect_encoding() will no longer return the following non text encodings: "Base64", "QPrint", "UUencode", "HTML entities", "7 bit" and "8 bit".

mb_detect_order

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-detect-order.php

Version Description
8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.

mb_encode_mimeheader

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-encode-mimeheader.php

Version Description
8.0.0 charset and transfer_encoding are nullable now.

mb_encode_numericentity

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-encode-numericentity.php

Version Description
8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.

mb_encoding_aliases

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-encoding-aliases.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If the encoding is unknown, a ValueError is now thrown; previously an E_WARNING was emitted, and the function returned false.

mb_ereg

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-ereg.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function returns true on success now. Previously, it returned the byte length of the matched string if a match for pattern was found in string and matches was passed. If the optional parameter matches was not passed or the length of the matched string was 0, this function returned 1.
7.1.0 mb_ereg() will now set matches to an empty array, if nothing matched. Formerly, matches was not modified in that case.

mb_eregi

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-eregi.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function returns true on success now. Previously, it returned the byte length of the matched string if a match for pattern was found in string and matches was passed. If the optional parameter matches was not passed or the length of the matched string was 0, this function returned 1.
7.1.0 mb_eregi() will now set matches to an empty array, if nothing matched. Formerly, matches was not modified in that case.

mb_eregi_replace

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-eregi-replace.php

Version Description
8.0.0 options is nullable now.
7.1.0 The function checks whether string is valid for the current encoding.
7.1.0 The e modifier has been deprecated.

mb_ereg_match

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-ereg-match.php

Version Description
8.0.0 options is nullable now.

mb_ereg_replace

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-ereg-replace.php

Version Description
8.0.0 options is nullable now.
7.1.0 The function checks whether string is valid for the current encoding.
7.1.0 The e modifier has been deprecated.

mb_ereg_replace_callback

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-ereg-replace-callback.php

Version Description
8.0.0 options is nullable now.
7.1.0 The function checks whether string is valid for the current encoding.

mb_ereg_search

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-ereg-search.php

Version Description
8.0.0 pattern and options are nullable now.

8.0.0 pattern and options are nullable now.

8.0.0 pattern and options are nullable now.

Version Description
8.0.0 pattern and options are nullable now.

mb_ereg_search_setpos

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-ereg-search-setpos.php

Version Description
7.1.0 Support for negative offsets has been added.

Version Description
8.0.0 The types "func_overload" and "func_overload_list" are no longer supported.

Version Description
8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError if encoding is an invalid encoding. Previously a E_WARNING was emitted instead.

Version Description
8.0.0 language is nullable now.

Version Description

mb_parse_str

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-parse-str.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The second parameter was no longer optional.
7.2.0 Calling mb_parse_str() without the second parameter was deprecated.

mb_regex_encoding

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-regex-encoding.php

Version Description
8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.

mb_regex_set_options

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-regex-set-options.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If the parameter options is given and not null, the previous options are returned. Formerly, the current options have been returned.
8.0.0 options is nullable now.
8.0.0 The "e" option now throws a ValueError.
7.1.0 The "e" option now emits an E_DEPRECATED.

mb_scrub

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-scrub.php

Version Description
8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.

mb_send_mail

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-send-mail.php

Version Description
8.0.0 additional_params is nullable now.
7.2.0 The additional_headers parameter now also accepts an array.

mb_strcut

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mb-strcut.php

Version Description
8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.

mb_strimwidth

Version Description
8.3.0 Passing a negative width to mb_strimwidth() is now deprecated.
8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.
7.1.0 Support for negative starts and widths has been added.

8.0.0 encoding is nullable now.
7.1.0 Support for negative offsets has been added.

Memcache::delete

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/memcache.delete.php

Version Description
Unknown It's not recommended to use the timeout parameter. The behavior differs between memcached versions, but setting to 0 is safe. Other values for this deprecated feature may cause the memcache delete to fail.

Memcached::get

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/memcached.get.php

Version Description
PECL memcached 3.0.0 The &cas_token parameter was removed. Instead get_flags was added and when it is given the value of Memcached::GET_EXTENDED it will ensure the CAS token to be fetched.

Memcached::getByKey

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/memcached.getbykey.php

Version Description
PECL memcached 3.0.0 The &cas_token parameter was removed. Instead get_flags was added and when it is given the value of Memcached::GET_EXTENDED it will ensure the CAS token to be fetched.

Memcached::getMulti

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/memcached.getmulti.php

Version Description
PECL memcached 3.0.0 The &cas_tokens parameter was removed. The Memcached::GET_EXTENDED was added and when passed as a flag it ensures the CAS tokens to be fetched.

Memcached::getMultiByKey

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/memcached.getmultibykey.php

Version Description
PECL memcached 3.0.0 The &cas_tokens parameter was removed. The Memcached::GET_EXTENDED was added and when passed as a flag it ensures the CAS tokens to be fetched.

metaphone

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.metaphone.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The function returned false on failure.

mhash

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mhash.php

Version Description
8.1.0 This function has been deprecated. Use the hash_*() functions instead.
8.0.0 key is now nullable.

mhash_count

Version Description
8.1.0 This function has been deprecated. Use the hash_*() functions instead.

8.1.0 This function has been deprecated. Use the hash_*() functions instead.
