Version Description
8.1.0 This function has been deprecated. Use the hash_*() functions instead.

min

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.min.php

Version Description
8.0.0 min() throws a ValueError on failure now; previously, false was returned and an E_WARNING error was emitted.
8.0.0 As string to number comparisons were changed, min() no longer returns a different value based on the argument order in those cases.

mktime

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mktime.php

Version Description
8.0.0 hour is no longer optional. If you need a Unix timestamp, use time().
8.0.0 minute, second, month, day and year are nullable now.

money_format

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.money-format.php

Version Description
7.4.0 This function has been deprecated. Instead, use NumberFormatter::formatCurrency().

MongoDB\BSON\Binary::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-bson-binary.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.15.0

The type parameter defaults to MongoDB\BSON\Binary::TYPE_GENERIC if not specified.

PECL mongodb 1.3.0

MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException is thrown if type is MongoDB\BSON\Binary::TYPE_UUID or MongoDB\BSON\Binary::TYPE_OLD_UUID and data is not exactly 16 bytes in length.

PECL mongodb 1.1.3

MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException is thrown if type is not an unsigned 8-bit integer.

MongoDB\BSON\Int64::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-bson-int64.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.16.0

This method was made public to support creating Int64 instances when working with raw BSON.

MongoDB\BSON\Javascript::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-bson-javascript.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.2.0

MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException is thrown if code contains null bytes. Previously, values would be truncated at the first null byte.

MongoDB\BSON\Persistable::bsonSerialize

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-bson-persistable.bsonserialize.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.17.0

This method may now also return MongoDB\BSON\Document instances in addition to array and stdClass.

MongoDB\BSON\Regex::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-bson-regex.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.2.0

The flags argument is optional and defaults to an empty string.

Characters in the flags argument will be sorted alphabetically when a Regex is constructed. Previously, the characters were stored in the order provided.

MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException is thrown if pattern or flags contain null bytes. Previously, values would be truncated at the first null byte.

MongoDB\BSON\Serializable::bsonSerialize

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-bson-serializable.bsonserialize.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.17.0

The return type was changed from array|object. Instead of object, the return type now specifies stdClass. Classes that implement this interface must be changed to no longer declare an object return type. As the return type is tentative, a deprecation warning is emitted on PHP 8.1 and newer.

In addition to the changes above, the driver now also supports returning instances of MongoDB\BSON\Document and MongoDB\BSON\PackedArray. Please note that any MongoDB\BSON\PackedArray instances returned are silently converted to objects when stored as root documents. They are stored as arrays when used as an embedded field value.

MongoDB\BSON\toPHP

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mongodb.bson-tophp.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.0

If the input contains an unsupported, deprecated BSON type, the driver will now no longer log a warning to the debug log, but instead will create an object representing this type.

PECL mongodb 1.3.2

MongoDB\Driver\Exception\UnexpectedValueException is no longer thrown if the input contains an unsupported, deprecated BSON type. Such types will be ignored (as they were in versions before 1.3.0), although the driver will now log a warning to the debug log (see: mongodb.debug).

PECL mongodb 1.3.0

MongoDB\Driver\Exception\UnexpectedValueException is thrown if the input contains an unsupported, deprecated BSON type. Previously, such types were ignored.

MongoDB\BSON\UTCDateTime::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-bson-utcdatetime.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.2.0

The milliseconds argument is optional and defaults to null (i.e. current time). The argument also accepts a DateTimeInterface, which may be used to derive the number of milliseconds since the Unix epoch. Previously, only int, float, and string types were accepted.

MongoDB\Driver\BulkWrite::count

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-bulkwrite.count.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.2.0 Returns the number of write operations added to the MongoDB\Driver\BulkWrite object. Earlier versions returned the expected number of client-to-server roundtrips required to execute all write operations.

MongoDB\Driver\BulkWrite::delete

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-bulkwrite.delete.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.8.0 Added the "hint" option.
PECL mongodb 1.2.0 Added the "collation" option.

MongoDB\Driver\BulkWrite::insert

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-bulkwrite.insert.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.3.0 The _id of the inserted document is always returned. Previously, the method only returned a value if a MongoDB\BSON\ObjectId was generated.

MongoDB\Driver\BulkWrite::update

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-bulkwrite.update.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.7.0 Added the "hint" option.
PECL mongodb 1.6.0 The newObj parameter now accepts an aggregation pipeline. This feature requires MongoDB 4.2+ and will result in an exception at execution time if specified for an older server version.
PECL mongodb 1.5.0 Using the "arrayFilters" option will result in an exception at execution time if unsupported by the server. Previously, no exception would be thrown and the option may have been ignored.
PECL mongodb 1.4.0 Added the "arrayFilters" option.
PECL mongodb 1.2.0 Added the "collation" option.

MongoDB\Driver\BulkWrite::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-bulkwrite.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.14.0 Added the "comment" and "let" options.
PECL mongodb 1.1.0 Added the "bypassDocumentValidation" option.

MongoDB\Driver\ClientEncryption::createDataKey

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-clientencryption.createdatakey.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.15.0 Added the "keyMaterial" option.
PECL mongodb 1.10.0 Azure and GCP are now supported as KMS providers for client-side encryption.

MongoDB\Driver\ClientEncryption::encrypt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-clientencryption.encrypt.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.14.0 Added the "contentionFactor" and "queryType" options.

MongoDB\Driver\ClientEncryption::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-clientencryption.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.16.0

The AWS KMS provider for client-side encryption now accepts a "sessionToken" option, which can be used to authenticate with temporary AWS credentials.

Added "tlsDisableOCSPEndpointCheck" to the "tlsOptions" option.

If an empty document is specified for the "azure" or "gcp" KMS provider, the driver will attempt to configure the provider using » Automatic Credentials.

PECL mongodb 1.15.0

If an empty document is specified for the "aws" KMS provider, the driver will attempt to configure the provider using » Automatic Credentials.

MongoDB\Driver\Command::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-command.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.0

Added a second commandOptions argument, which supports the "maxAwaitTimeMS" option.

MongoDB\Driver\Manager::createClientEncryption

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-manager.createclientencryption.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.16.0

The AWS KMS provider for client-side encryption now accepts a "sessionToken" option, which can be used to authenticate with temporary AWS credentials.

Added "tlsDisableOCSPEndpointCheck" to the "tlsOptions" option.

If an empty document is specified for the "azure" or "gcp" KMS provider, the driver will attempt to configure the provider using » Automatic Credentials.

PECL mongodb 1.15.0

If an empty document is specified for the "aws" KMS provider, the driver will attempt to configure the provider using » Automatic Credentials.

PECL mongodb 1.12.0

KMIP is now supported as a KMS provider for client-side encryption and may be configured in the "kmsProviders" option.

Added the "tlsOptions" option.

PECL mongodb 1.10.0 Azure and GCP are now supported as KMS providers for client-side encryption and may be configured in the "kmsProviders" option. Base64-encoded strings are now accepted as an alternative to MongoDB\BSON\Binary for options within "kmsProviders".

MongoDB\Driver\Manager::executeBulkWrite

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-manager.executebulkwrite.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.4 MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException will be thrown if the "session" option is used in combination with an unacknowledged write concern.
PECL mongodb 1.4.0 The third parameter is now an options array. For backwards compatibility, this paramater will still accept a MongoDB\Driver\WriteConcern object.
PECL mongodb 1.3.0 MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException is now thrown if bulk does not contain any write operations. Previously, a MongoDB\Driver\Exception\BulkWriteException was thrown.

MongoDB\Driver\Manager::executeCommand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-manager.executecommand.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.4 MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException will be thrown if the "session" option is used in combination with an unacknowledged write concern.
PECL mongodb 1.4.0 The third parameter is now an options array. For backwards compatibility, this paramater will still accept a MongoDB\Driver\ReadPreference object.

MongoDB\Driver\Manager::executeQuery

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-manager.executequery.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.0 The third parameter is now an options array. For backwards compatibility, this paramater will still accept a MongoDB\Driver\ReadPreference object.

MongoDB\Driver\Manager::executeReadWriteCommand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-manager.executereadwritecommand.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.4 MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException will be thrown if the "session" option is used in combination with an unacknowledged write concern.

MongoDB\Driver\Manager::executeWriteCommand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-manager.executewritecommand.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.4 MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException will be thrown if the "session" option is used in combination with an unacknowledged write concern.

MongoDB\Driver\Manager::selectServer

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-manager.selectserver.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.11.0 The readPreference is now optional. If null or omitted, the primary server will be selected by default.

MongoDB\Driver\Manager::startSession

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-manager.startsession.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.11.0

The "snapshot" option was added.

PECL mongodb 1.6.0

The "maxCommitTimeMS" option was added to "defaultTransactionOptions".

PECL mongodb 1.5.0

The "defaultTransactionOptions" option was added.

MongoDB\Driver\Manager::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-manager.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.16.0

The AWS KMS provider for client-side encryption now accepts a "sessionToken" option, which can be used to authenticate with temporary AWS credentials.

Added "tlsDisableOCSPEndpointCheck" to the "tlsOptions" field of the "autoEncryption" driver option.

If an empty document is specified for the "azure" or "gcp" KMS provider, the driver will attempt to configure the provider using » Automatic Credentials.

PECL mongodb 1.15.0

If an empty document is specified for the "aws" KMS provider, the driver will attempt to configure the provider using » Automatic Credentials.

PECL mongodb 1.14.0

Added the "bypassQueryAnalysis" and "encryptedFieldsMap" auto encryption options. Additional options pertaining to crypt_shared are now supported in the "extraOptions" auto encryption option.

PECL mongodb 1.13.0

Added the "srvMaxHosts" and "srvServiceName" URI options.

PECL mongodb 1.12.0

KMIP is now supported as a KMS provider for client-side encryption and may be configured in the "kmsProviders" field of the "autoEncryption" driver option. Additionally, TLS options for KMS providers may now be configured in the "tlsOptions" field of the "autoEncryption" driver option.

PECL mongodb 1.11.0

Added the "loadBalanced" URI option.

PECL mongodb 1.10.0

Added the "disableClientPersistence" driver option.

Azure and GCP are now supported as KMS providers for client-side encryption and may be configured in the "kmsProviders" field of the "autoEncryption" driver option. Base64-encoded strings are now accepted as an alternative to MongoDB\BSON\Binary for options within "kmsProviders".

PECL mongodb 1.8.0

Added the "directConnection", "tlsDisableCertificateRevocationCheck", and "tlsDisableOCSPEndpointCheck" URI options.

Added the "driver" driver option.

PECL mongodb 1.7.0

Added the "autoEncryption" driver option.

Specifying any SSL or TLS option via the driverOptions parameter will now implicitly enable TLS, as is done for the corresponding URI options.

PECL mongodb 1.6.0

Added the "retryReads", "tls", "tlsAllowInvalidCertificates", "tlsAllowInvalidHostnames", "tlsCAFile", "tlsCertificateKeyFile", "tlsCertificateKeyFilePassword", and "tlsInsecure" URI options.

The "retryWrites" URI option defaults to true.

Specifying any SSL or TLS URI option via the connection string or uriOptions parameter will now implicitly enable TLS unless ssl or tls is false. TLS is not implicitly enabled for any options in the driverOptions parameter, which is unchanged from previous versions.

PECL mongodb 1.5.0

"wtimeoutMS" is now always validated and applied to the write concern. Previously, the option was ignored if "w" was <= 1, since the timeout only applies to replication.

PECL mongodb 1.4.0

Added the "compressors", "retryWrites", and "zlibCompressionLevel" URI options.

PECL mongodb 1.3.0

The uriOptions argument now accepts "authMechanism" and "authMechanismProperties" options. Previously, these options were only supported in the uri argument.

PECL mongodb 1.2.0

The uri argument defaults to "mongodb://127.0.0.1/". The default port remains 27017.

Added the "appname" URI option.

Added the "allow_invalid_hostname", "ca_file", "ca_dir", "clr_file", "pem_file", "pem_pwd", and "weak_cert_validation" driver options.

The PHP Streams API is no longer used for socket communication. The "connectTimeoutMS" URI option now defaults to 10 seconds instead of default_socket_timeout in previous versions. Additionally, the driver no longer supports all SSL context options via the "context" driver option.

PECL mongodb 1.1.0

The uri argument is optional and defaults to "mongodb://localhost:27017/".

MongoDB\Driver\Query::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-query.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.14.0

Added the "let" option. The "comment" option now accepts any type.

PECL mongodb 1.8.0

Added the "allowDiskUse" option.

The "oplogReplay" option is deprecated.

PECL mongodb 1.5.0

The "maxScan" and "snapshot" options are deprecated.

PECL mongodb 1.3.0

Added the "maxAwaitTimeMS" option.

PECL mongodb 1.2.0

Added the "allowPartialResults", "collation", "comment", "hint", "max", "maxScan", "maxTimeMS", "min", "returnKey", "showRecordId", and "snapshot" options.

Renamed the "partial" option to "allowPartialResults". For backwards compatibility, "partial" will still be read if "allowPartialResults" is not specified.

Removed the legacy "secondaryOk" option, which is obsolete. For queries using the legacy wire protocol OP_QUERY, the driver will set the secondaryOk bit as needed in accordance with the » Server Selection Specification.

PECL mongodb 1.1.0 Added the "readConcern" option.

MongoDB\Driver\ReadPreference::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-readpreference.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.8.0 Added the "hedge" option.
PECL mongodb 1.3.0

The mode argument now accepts a string value, which is consistent with the "readPreference" URI option for MongoDB\Driver\Manager::__construct().

PECL mongodb 1.2.0

Added a third options argument, which supports the "maxStalenessSeconds" option.

MongoDB\Driver\Server::executeBulkWrite

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-server.executebulkwrite.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.4 MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException will be thrown if the "session" option is used in combination with an unacknowledged write concern.
PECL mongodb 1.4.0 The third parameter is now an options array. For backwards compatibility, this paramater will still accept a MongoDB\Driver\WriteConcern object.
PECL mongodb 1.3.0 MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException is now thrown if bulk does not contain any write operations. Previously, a MongoDB\Driver\Exception\BulkWriteException was thrown.

MongoDB\Driver\Server::executeCommand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-server.executecommand.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.4 MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException will be thrown if the "session" option is used in combination with an unacknowledged write concern.
PECL mongodb 1.4.0 The third parameter is now an options array. For backwards compatibility, this paramater will still accept a MongoDB\Driver\ReadPreference object.

MongoDB\Driver\Server::executeQuery

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-server.executequery.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.0 The third parameter is now an options array. For backwards compatibility, this paramater will still accept a MongoDB\Driver\ReadPreference object.

MongoDB\Driver\Server::executeReadWriteCommand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-server.executereadwritecommand.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.4 MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException will be thrown if the "session" option is used in combination with an unacknowledged write concern.

MongoDB\Driver\Server::executeWriteCommand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-server.executewritecommand.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.4.4 MongoDB\Driver\Exception\InvalidArgumentException will be thrown if the "session" option is used in combination with an unacknowledged write concern.

MongoDB\Driver\Server::getInfo

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-server.getinfo.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.11.0 When the driver is connected to a load balancer, this method returns the backing server's hello command response from the initial connection handshake.

MongoDB\Driver\Server::getLatency

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-server.getlatency.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.11.0 This method will return null if no latency has been measured. In earlier versions, an integer was always returned and an unset value might be reported as -1.

MongoDB\Driver\Session::startTransaction

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-session.starttransaction.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.6.0

The "maxCommitTimeMS" option was added.

MongoDB\Driver\WriteConcern::getWtimeout

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-writeconcern.getwtimeout.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.7.0 On 32-bit systems, this method will always truncate the wTimeout value if it exceeds the 32-bit range. In that case, a warning will be emitted.

MongoDB\Driver\WriteConcern::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mongodb-driver-writeconcern.construct.php

Version Description
PECL mongodb 1.7.0 The wTimeout parameter now accepts 64-bit values.

msg_get_queue

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.msg-get-queue.php

Version Description
8.0.0 On success, this function returns a SysvMessageQueue instance now; previously, a resource was returned.

msg_receive

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.msg-receive.php

Version Description
8.0.0 queue expects a SysvMessageQueue instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

msg_remove_queue

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.msg-remove-queue.php

Version Description
8.0.0 queue expects a SysvMessageQueue instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

msg_send

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.msg-send.php

Version Description
8.0.0 queue expects a SysvMessageQueue instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

msg_set_queue

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.msg-set-queue.php

Version Description
8.0.0 queue expects a SysvMessageQueue instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

msg_stat_queue

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.msg-stat-queue.php

Version Description
8.0.0 queue expects a SysvMessageQueue instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

mt_rand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mt-rand.php

Version Description
7.2.0 mt_rand() has received a bug fix for a modulo bias bug. This means that sequences generated with a specific seed may differ from PHP 7.1 on 64-bit machines.
7.1.0 rand() has been made an alias of mt_rand().
7.1.0 mt_rand() has been updated to use the fixed, correct, version of the Mersenne Twister algorithm. To fall back to the old behaviour, use mt_srand() with MT_RAND_PHP as the second parameter.

mt_srand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mt-srand.php

Version Description
8.3.0 seed is now nullable.
7.1.0 srand() has been made an alias of mt_srand().
7.1.0 mt_rand() has been updated to use the fixed, correct, version of the Mersenne Twister algorithm. To fall back to the old behaviour, use mt_srand() with MT_RAND_PHP as the second parameter.

MultipleIterator::current

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/multipleiterator.current.php

Version Description
8.1.0 A RuntimeException is now thrown if MultipleIterator::current() is called on an invalid iterator. Previously, false was returned.

MultipleIterator::key

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/multipleiterator.key.php

Version Description
8.1.0 A RuntimeException is now thrown if MultipleIterator::key() is called on an invalid iterator. Previously, false was returned.

mysqli::$client_info

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.get-client-info.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Calling mysqli_get_client_info() with the mysql argument has been deprecated. This function never required a parameter, but incorrectly allowed it as an optional parameter.
8.1.0 The object-oriented style mysqli::get_client_info() has been deprecated.

mysqli::begin_transaction

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.begin-transaction.php

Version Description
8.0.0 name is now nullable.

mysqli::close

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.close.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function now always returns true. Previously it returned false on failure.

mysqli::commit

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.commit.php

Version Description
8.0.0 name is now nullable.

mysqli::debug

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.debug.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function now always returns true. Previously it returned false on failure.

mysqli::init

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.init.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The object-oriented style mysqli::init() method has been deprecated. Replace calls to parent::init() with parent::__construct().

mysqli::poll

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.poll.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now throws a ValueError exception when neither the read nor error arguments are passed.

mysqli::real_connect

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.real-connect.php

Version Description
7.4.0 All parameters are now nullable.

mysqli::rollback

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.rollback.php

Version Description
8.0.0 name is now nullable.

mysqli::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli.construct.php

Version Description
8.1.0 mysqli::connect() now returns true instead of null on success.
7.4.0 All parameters are now nullable.

mysqli_driver::$report_mode

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli-driver.report-mode.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The default value is now MYSQLI_REPORT_ERROR | MYSQLI_REPORT_STRICT. Previously, it was MYSQLI_REPORT_OFF.

mysqli_result::fetch_all

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli-result.fetch-all.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Now also available when linking against libmysqlclient.

mysqli_result::fetch_object

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli-result.fetch-object.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now throws a ValueError exception when the constructor_args is non-empty with the class not having constructor; previously an Exception was thrown.
8.0.0 constructor_args now accepts [] for constructors with 0 parameters; previously an exception was thrown.

mysqli_result::field_seek

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli-result.field-seek.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function now always returns true. Previously it returned false on failure.

Version Description
8.0.0 This function now always returns true. Previously it returned false on failure.

Version Description
8.1.0 The optional params parameter has been added.

mysqli_stmt::next_result

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysqli-stmt.next-result.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Now also available when linking against libmysqlclient.

mysqli_stmt::__construct

Version Description
8.0.0 query is now nullable.

mysql_list_tables

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.mysql-list-tables.php

Version Description
4.3.7 This function became deprecated.

natcasesort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.natcasesort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

natsort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.natsort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

next

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.next.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Calling this function on objects is deprecated. Either convert the object to an array using get_mangled_object_vars() first, or use the methods provided by a class that implements Iterator, such as ArrayIterator, instead.
7.4.0 Instances of SPL classes are now treated like empty objects that have no properties instead of calling the Iterator method with the same name as this function.

NumberFormatter::create

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/numberformatter.create.php

Version Description
8.0.0 pattern is nullable now.

number_format

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.number-format.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Prior to this version, number_format() accepted one, two, or four parameters (but not three).
7.2.0 number_format() was changed to not being able to return -0, previously -0 could be returned for cases like where num would be -0.01.

octdec

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.octdec.php

Version Description

Version Description
8.0.0 flags was removed.

odbc_fetch_row

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.odbc-fetch-row.php

Version Description
8.0.0 row is nullable now.

odbc_procedurecolumns

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.odbc-procedurecolumns.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Prior to this version, the function could only be called with either one or five arguments.

Version Description
8.0.0 Prior to this version, the function could only be called with either one or four arguments.

Version Description
8.1.0 This function has been deprecated.

odbc_tables

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.odbc-tables.php

Version Description
8.0.0 schema, table and types are now nullable.

opendir

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.opendir.php

Version Description
8.0.0 context is now nullable.

openlog

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openlog.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The function now always returns true. Previously it returned false on failure.

openssl_cms_encrypt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-cms-encrypt.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The default cipher algorithm (cipher_algo) is now AES-128-CBC (OPENSSL_CIPHER_AES_128_CBC). Previously, PKCS7/CMS was used (OPENSSL_CIPHER_RC2_40).

openssl_csr_export

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-csr-export.php

Version Description
8.0.0 csr accepts an OpenSSLCertificateSigningRequest instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL X.509 CSR was accepted.

openssl_csr_export_to_file

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-csr-export-to-file.php

Version Description
8.0.0 csr accepts an OpenSSLCertificateSigningRequest instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL X.509 CSR was accepted.

openssl_csr_get_public_key

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-csr-get-public-key.php

Version Description
8.0.0 On success, this function returns an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL key was returned.
8.0.0 csr accepts an OpenSSLCertificateSigningRequest instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL X.509 CSR was accepted.

openssl_csr_get_subject

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-csr-get-subject.php

Version Description
8.0.0 csr accepts an OpenSSLCertificateSigningRequest instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL X.509 CSR was accepted.

openssl_csr_new

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-csr-new.php

Version Description
8.0.0 On success, this function returns an OpenSSLCertificateSigningRequest instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL X.509 CSR was returned.
8.0.0 private_key accepts an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL key was accepted.
7.1.0 options now also supports curve_name.

openssl_csr_sign

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-csr-sign.php

Version Description
8.0.0 On success, this function returns an OpenSSLCertificate instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL X.509 was returned.
8.0.0 csr accepts an OpenSSLCertificateSigningRequest instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL X.509 CSR was accepted.
8.0.0 ca_certificate accepts an OpenSSLCertificate instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL X.509 was accepted.
8.0.0 private_key accepts an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey or OpenSSLCertificate instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL key or OpenSSL X.509 was accepted.

openssl_decrypt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-decrypt.php

Version Description
8.1.0 tag is now nullable.
7.1.0 The tag and aad parameters were added.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-dh-compute-key.php

Version Description
8.0.0 private_key accepts an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL key was accepted.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-encrypt.php

Version Description
7.1.0 The tag, aad and tag_length parameters were added.

openssl_free_key

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-free-key.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function is now deprecated as it doesn't have an effect anymore.
8.0.0 key accepts an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL key was accepted.

openssl_open

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-open.php

Version Description
8.0.0 private_key accepts an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey or OpenSSLCertificate instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL key or OpenSSL X.509 CSR was accepted.
8.0.0 cipher_algo is no longer an optional parameter.

openssl_pkcs7_decrypt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-pkcs7-decrypt.php

Version Description
8.0.0 private_key accepts an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey or OpenSSLCertificate instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL key or OpenSSL X.509 CSR was accepted.

openssl_pkcs7_encrypt

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-pkcs7-encrypt.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The default cipher algorithm (cipher_algo) is now AES-128-CBC (OPENSSL_CIPHER_AES_128_CBC). Previously, PKCS7/CMS was used (OPENSSL_CIPHER_RC2_40).
8.0.0 certificate accepts an OpenSSLCertificate instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL X.509 CSR was accepted.

openssl_pkcs7_sign

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.openssl-pkcs7-sign.php

Version Description
8.0.0 certificate accepts an OpenSSLCertificate instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL X.509 CSR was accepted.
8.0.0 private_key accepts an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey or OpenSSLCertificate instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL key or OpenSSL X.509 CSR was accepted.

Version Description
8.0.0 signers_certificates_filename, untrusted_certificates_filename, content and output_filename are nullable now.
7.2.0 The output_filename parameter was added.

7.1.0 The curve_name option was added to make it possible to create EC keys.

8.0.0 public_key accepts an OpenSSLAsymmetricKey or OpenSSLCertificate instance now; previously, a resource of type OpenSSL key or OpenSSL X.509 was accepted.

output_add_rewrite_var

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.output-add-rewrite-var.php

Version Description
7.1.0 As of PHP 7.1.0, a dedicated output buffer is used, url_rewriter.tags is used solely for output functions and url_rewriter.hosts is available. Prior to PHP 7.1.0, rewrite variables set by output_add_rewrite_var() shared an output buffer with transparent session id support (see session.trans_sid_tags).

output_reset_rewrite_vars

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.output-reset-rewrite-vars.php

Version Description
7.1.0 Before PHP 7.1.0, rewrite vars set by output_add_rewrite_var() use the same Session module trans sid output buffer. Since PHP 7.1.0, dedicated output buffer is used and output_reset_rewrite_vars() only removes rewrite vars defined by output_add_rewrite_var().

pack

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.pack.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns false on failure.
7.2.0 float and double types supports both Big Endian and Little Endian.
7.0.15,7.1.1 The "e", "E", "g" and "G" codes were added to enable byte order support for float and double.

parse_str

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.parse-str.php

Version Description
8.0.0 result is no longer optional.
7.2.0 Usage of parse_str() without a second parameter now emits an E_DEPRECATED notice.

parse_url

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.parse-url.php

Version Description
8.0.0 parse_url() will now distinguish absent and empty queries and fragments.

passthru

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.passthru.php

Version Description
8.0.0 If command is empty or contains null bytes, passthru() now throws a ValueError. Previously it emitted an E_WARNING and returned false.

password_hash

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.password-hash.php

Version Description
8.0.0 password_hash() no longer returns false on failure, instead a ValueError will be thrown if the password hashing algorithm is not valid, or an Error if the password hashing failed for an unknown error.
8.0.0 The algo parameter is nullable now.
7.4.0 The algo parameter expects a string now, but still accepts ints for backward compatibility.
7.4.0 The sodium extension provides an alternative implementation for Argon2 passwords.
7.3.0 Support for Argon2id passwords using PASSWORD_ARGON2ID was added.
7.2.0 Support for Argon2i passwords using PASSWORD_ARGON2I was added.

password_needs_rehash

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.password-needs-rehash.php

Version Description
7.4.0 The algo parameter expects a string now, but still accepts ints for backward compatibility.

pcntl_async_signals

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.pcntl-async-signals.php

Version Description
8.0.0 enable is nullable now.

pcntl_getpriority

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.pcntl-getpriority.php

Version Description
8.0.0 process_id is nullable now.

pcntl_setpriority

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.pcntl-setpriority.php

Version Description
8.0.0 process_id is nullable now.

pcntl_signal

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.pcntl-signal.php

Version Description
7.1.0 As of PHP 7.1.0 the handler callback is given a second argument containing the siginfo of the specific signal. This data is only supplied if the operating system has the siginfo_t structure. If the OS does not implement siginfo_t NULL is supplied.

pcntl_signal_get_handler

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.pcntl-signal-get-handler.php

Version Description
7.1.0 pcntl_signal_get_handler() has been added.

PDO::sqliteCreateFunction

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/pdo.sqlitecreatefunction.php

Version Description
7.1.4 The flags parameter has been added.

PDOStatement::debugDumpParams

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/pdostatement.debugdumpparams.php

Version Description
7.2.0 PDOStatement::debugDumpParams() now returns the SQL sent to the database, including the full, raw query (including the replaced placeholders with their bounded values). Note, that this will only be available if emulated prepared statements are turned on.

PDOStatement::fetchAll

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/pdostatement.fetchall.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This method always returns an array now, while previously false may have been returned on failure.

Version Description
8.0.0 timeout is nullable now.

posix_eaccess

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.posix-eaccess.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Checks the effective user/group for a file, differing from posix_access() which checks from the real user/group.

posix_getrlimit

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.posix-getrlimit.php

Version Description
8.3.0 The optional resource parameter has been added.

posix_isatty

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.posix-isatty.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Type error E_WARNINGs are now raised for integer coercions following the usual PHP type coercion semantics.

posix_ttyname

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.posix-ttyname.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Type error E_WARNINGs are now raised for integer coercions following the usual PHP type coercion semantics.
8.3.0 On invalid file_descriptor integer values an E_WARNING is now raised.

preg_match

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.preg-match.php

Version Description
7.2.0 The PREG_UNMATCHED_AS_NULL is now supported for the $flags parameter.

preg_match_all

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.preg-match-all.php

Version Description
7.2.0 The PREG_UNMATCHED_AS_NULL is now supported for the $flags parameter.

preg_quote

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.preg-quote.php

Version Description
7.3.0 The # character is now quoted
7.2.0 delimiter is nullable now.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.preg-replace-callback.php

Version Description
7.4.0 The flags parameter was added.

preg_replace_callback_array

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.preg-replace-callback-array.php

Version Description
7.4.0 The flags parameter was added.

prev

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.prev.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Calling this function on objects is deprecated. Either convert the object to an array using get_mangled_object_vars() first, or use the methods provided by a class that implements Iterator, such as ArrayIterator, instead.
7.4.0 Instances of SPL classes are now treated like empty objects that have no properties instead of calling the Iterator method with the same name as this function.

printf

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.printf.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns false on failure.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if the number of arguments is zero; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [width] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [precision] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ArgumentCountError when less arguments are given than required; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.

proc_nice

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.proc-nice.php

Version Description
7.2.0 This function is now available on Windows.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.proc-open.php

Version Description
7.4.4 Added the create_new_console option to the options parameter.
7.4.0 proc_open() now also accepts an array for the command.
7.4.0 Added the create_process_group option to the options parameter.

rand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.rand.php

Version Description
7.2.0 rand() has received a bug fix for a modulo bias bug. This means that sequences generated with a specific seed may differ from PHP 7.1 on 64-bit machines.
7.1.0 rand() has been made an alias of mt_rand().

random_bytes

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.random-bytes.php

Version Description
8.2.0 In case of a CSPRNG failure, this function will now throw a Random\RandomException. Previously a plain Exception was thrown.

random_int

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.random-int.php

Version Description
8.2.0 In case of a CSPRNG failure, this function will now throw a Random\RandomException. Previously a plain Exception was thrown.

range

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.range.php

Version Description
8.3.0 If both start and end are strings then range() will now always produce an array of bytes. Previously if one of the boundary values was a numeric string, then the other boundary value was implicitly cast to int.
8.3.0 An E_WARNING is now emitted if start or end is a string that is implicitly cast to int because the other boundary value is a number.
8.3.0 An E_WARNING is now emitted if start or end is a non-numeric string with more than one byte.
8.3.0 An E_WARNING is now emitted if start or end is the empty string.
8.3.0 If step is a float with no fractional part, it will be interpreted as an int.
8.3.0 A ValueError is now thrown if step is negative when producing an increasing range.
8.3.0 A ValueError is now thrown if step is not finite.
8.3.0 A TypeError is now thrown if start or end is an array, object, or resource. Previously they were implicitly cast to int.

RarArchive::close

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/rararchive.close.php

Version Description
PECL rar 2.0.0 The RAR entries returned by RarArchive::getEntry() and RarArchive::getEntries() are now invalidated when calling this method. This means that all instance methods called for such entries and not guaranteed to succeed.

RarArchive::getEntries

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/rararchive.getentries.php

Version Description
PECL rar 3.0.0 Support for RAR archives with repeated entry names is no longer defective.

RarArchive::open

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/rararchive.open.php

Version Description
PECL rar 3.0.0 volume_callback was added.

RarEntry::extract

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/rarentry.extract.php

Version Description
PECL rar 3.0.0 extended_data was added.
PECL rar 3.0.0 Support for RAR archives with repeated entry names is no longer defective.

RarEntry::getCrc

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/rarentry.getcrc.php

Version Description
PECL rar 2.0.0 This method now returns correct values for multiple volume archives.

RarEntry::getName

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/rarentry.getname.php

Version Description
PECL rar 2.0.0 As of version 2.0.0, the returned string is encoded in Unicode/UTF-8.

RarEntry::getPackedSize

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/rarentry.getpackedsize.php

Version Description
PECL rar 2.0.0 This method now returns correct values of packed sizes bigger than 2 GiB on platforms with 64-bit ints and never returns negative values on other platforms.

RarEntry::getStream

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/rarentry.getstream.php

Version Description
PECL rar 3.0.0 Support for RAR archives with repeated entry names is no longer defective.

RarEntry::getUnpackedSize

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/rarentry.getunpackedsize.php

Version Description
PECL rar 2.0.0 This method now returns correct values of unpacked sizes bigger than 2 GiB on platforms with 64-bit ints and never returns negative values on other platforms.

Version Description
8.0.0 dir_handle is now nullable.

Version Description
8.0.0 var_name and value are nullable now.

Version Description
7.2.0 This function alias was deprecated.

Version Description
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError if directory is an empty string; previously it threw a RuntimeException.

Version Description
8.0.0 level is now nullable.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionclass.getstaticproperties.php

Version Description
8.3.0 The return type of ReflectionClass::getStaticProperties() has been changed to array from ?array.

ReflectionClassConstant::getName

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionclassconstant.getname.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Throws an Error in case the name property has not been initialized. Previously, the method returned false on failure.

ReflectionEnum::getBackingType

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionenum.getbackingtype.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is now declared as ?ReflectionNamedType. Previously, ?ReflectionType was declared.

ReflectionExtension::__clone

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionextension.clone.php

Version Description
8.1.0 This method is no longer final.

ReflectionFunction::invokeArgs

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionfunction.invokeargs.php

Version Description
8.0.0 args keys will now be interpreted as parameter names, instead of being silently ignored.

ReflectionFunctionAbstract::isStatic

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectiofunctionabstract.isstatic.php

Version Description
8.1.0 This method has been pulled up. Previously, it was only defined in ReflectionMethod.

ReflectionFunctionAbstract::__clone

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionfunctionabstract.clone.php

Version Description
8.1.0 This method is no longer final.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionmethod.getclosure.php

Version Description
8.0.0 object is now nullable.

ReflectionMethod::invokeArgs

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionmethod.invokeargs.php

Version Description
8.0.0 args keys will now be interpreted as parameter names, instead of being silently ignored.

ReflectionParameter::getDefaultValue

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionparameter.getdefaultvalue.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This method now allows getting the default value of parameters of built-in functions and built-in class methods. Previously, a ReflectionException was thrown.

ReflectionParameter::getDefaultValueConstantName

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionparameter.getdefaultvalueconstantname.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This method now allows getting the default values' constant names of built-in functions and built-in class methods. Previously, a ReflectionException was thrown.

ReflectionParameter::__clone

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionparameter.clone.php

Version Description
8.1.0 This method is no longer final.

ReflectionProperty::getValue

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionproperty.getvalue.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Private and protected properties can be accessed by ReflectionProperty::getValue() right away. Previously, they needed to be made accessible by calling ReflectionProperty::setAccessible(); otherwise a ReflectionException was thrown.
8.0.0 object is nullable now.

ReflectionProperty::isInitialized

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionproperty.isinitialized.php

Version Description
8.0.0 object is nullable now.

ReflectionProperty::setValue

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionproperty.setvalue.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling this method with a single argument is deprecated, ReflectionClass::setStaticPropertyValue() should be used instead to modify static properties.
8.1.0 Private and protected properties can be accessed by ReflectionProperty::setValue() right away. Previously, they needed to be made accessible by calling ReflectionProperty::setAccessible(); otherwise a ReflectionException was thrown.

ReflectionProperty::__clone

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionproperty.clone.php

Version Description
8.1.0 This method is no longer final.

ReflectionType::__toString

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectiontype.tostring.php

Version Description
8.0.0 ReflectionType::__toString() has been undeprecated.
7.1.0 ReflectionType::__toString() has been deprecated.

ReflectionZendExtension::__clone

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/reflectionzendextension.clone.php

Version Description
8.1.0 This method is no longer final.

reset

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.reset.php

Version Description
8.1.0 Calling this function on objects is deprecated. Either convert the object to an array using get_mangled_object_vars() first, or use the methods provided by a class that implements Iterator, such as ArrayIterator, instead.
7.4.0 Instances of SPL classes are now treated like empty objects that have no properties instead of calling the Iterator method with the same name as this function.

rewinddir

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.rewinddir.php

Version Description
8.0.0 dir_handle is now nullable.

round

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.round.php

Version Description
8.0.0 num no longer accepts internal objects which support numeric conversion.

Version Description
8.0.14 Method renamed from getColumnCount() to getColumnsCount().

Version Description
0.7.0 Optional operator was added.

Version Description

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.session-get-cookie-params.php

Version Description
7.3.0 The "samesite" entry was added in the returned array.

session_id

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.session-id.php

Version Description
8.0.0 id is nullable now.

session_module_name

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.session-module-name.php

Version Description
8.0.0 module is nullable now.
7.2.0 It is now explicitly forbidden to set the module name to "user". Formerly, this has been silently ignored.

session_name

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.session-name.php

Version Description
8.0.0 name is nullable now.
7.2.0 session_name() checks session status, previously it only checked cookie status. Therefore, older session_name() allows to call session_name() after session_start() which may crash PHP and may result in misbehaviors.

session_reset

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.session-reset.php

Version Description
7.2.0 The return type of this function is bool now. Formerly, it has been void.

session_save_path

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.session-save-path.php

Version Description
8.0.0 path is nullable now.

session_set_cookie_params

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.session-set-cookie-params.php

Version Description
8.0.0 path, domain, secure and httponly are nullable now.
7.3.0 An alternative signature supporting an lifetime_or_options array has been added. This signature supports also setting of the SameSite cookie attribute.
7.2.0 Returns true on success or false on failure. Formerly the function returned void.

session_start

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.session-start.php

Version Description
7.1.0 session_start() now returns false and no longer initializes $_SESSION when it failed to start the session.

session_unset

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.session-unset.php

Version Description
7.2.0 The return type of this function is bool now. Formerly, it has been void.

session_write_close

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.session-write-close.php

Version Description
7.2.0 The return type of this function is bool now. Formerly, it has been void.

setcookie

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.setcookie.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The date format of the cookie is now 'D, d M Y H:i:s \G\M\T'; previously it was 'D, d-M-Y H:i:s T'.
7.3.0 An alternative signature supporting an options array has been added. This signature supports also setting of the SameSite cookie attribute.

setrawcookie

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.setrawcookie.php

Version Description
7.3.0 An alternative signature supporting an options array has been added. This signature supports also setting of the SameSite cookie attribute.

set_error_handler

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.set-error-handler.php

Version Description
8.0.0 errcontext was removed, and will no longer be passed to user callbacks.
7.2.0 errcontext became deprecated. Usage of this parameter now emits an E_DEPRECATED notice.

shmop_close

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.shmop-close.php

Version Description
8.0.0 shmop expects a Shmop instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

Version Description
8.0.0 shmop expects a Shmop instance now; previously, a resource was expected.

shmop_open

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.shmop-open.php

Version Description
8.0.0 On success, this function returns an Shmop instance now; previously, a resource was returned.
8.0.0 If mode is invalid, or size is less than or equal to zero, a ValueError is thrown; previously E_WARNING was emitted instead, and the function returned false.

Version Description
8.0.0 shmop expects a Shmop instance now; previously, a resource was expected.
8.0.0 If offset or size are out of range, a ValueError is thrown; previously E_WARNING was emitted, and false was returned,

Version Description
8.1.0 An Error is now thrown if SimpleXMLElement::key() is called on an invalid iterator. Previously, false was returned.

sleep

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.sleep.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The function throws a ValueError on negative seconds; previously, an E_WARNING was raised instead, and the function returned false.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.socket-wsaprotocol-info-import.php

Version Description
8.0.0 On success, this function returns a Socket instance now; previously, a resource was returned.

SolrClient::commit

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/solrclient.commit.php

Version Description
PECL solr 1.1.0, 2.0.0 $maxSegments removed
PECL solr 2.0.0b API Changed: SolrClient::commit ([ int $maxSegments = 0 [, bool $softCommit = false [, bool $waitSearcher = true[, bool $expungeDeletes = false ]]] )
PECL solr 0.9.2 Signature: SolrClient::commit ([ int $maxSegments = 1 [, bool $waitFlush = true [, bool $waitSearcher = true ]]] ). $waitFlush: Block until index changes are flushed to disk.

SolrQuery::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/solrquery.construct.php

Version Description
PECL solr 2.0.0 If q was invalid, then a SolrIllegalArgumentException is now thrown. Previously an error was emitted.

sort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.sort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.

soundex

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.soundex.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Prior to this version, calling the function with an empty string returned false for no particular reason.

Version Description
8.0.0 class is now nullable.

Version Description
8.0.0 class is now nullable.

SplFileInfo::openFile

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/splfileinfo.openfile.php

Version Description
8.0.0 context is now nullable.

SplFileObject::fgetcsv

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/splfileobject.fgetcsv.php

Version Description
7.4.0 The escape parameter now also accepts an empty string to disable the proprietary escape mechanism.

SplFileObject::fputcsv

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/splfileobject.fputcsv.php

Version Description
8.1.0 The optional eol parameter has been added.
7.4.0 The escape parameter now also accepts an empty string to disable the proprietary escape mechanism.

SplFileObject::fwrite

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/splfileobject.fwrite.php

Version Description
7.4.0 The function now returns false instead of zero on failure.

SplFileObject::getCsvControl

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/splfileobject.getcsvcontrol.php

Version Description
7.4.0 The escape character can now be an empty string.
7.0.10 Added the escape character to the returned array.

SplFileObject::setCsvControl

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/splfileobject.setcsvcontrol.php

Version Description
7.4.0 The escape parameter now also accepts an empty string to disable the proprietary escape mechanism.

SplFileObject::__toString

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/splfileobject.tostring.php

Version Description
8.1.14, 8.2.1 Changed from an alias of SplFileObject::fgets() to an implementation of SplFileObject::current() which returns a CSV string when the SplFileObject::READ_CSV flag is set.
7.2.19, 7.3.6 Changed from an alias of SplFileObject::current() to an alias of SplFileObject::fgets().

SplFixedArray::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/splfixedarray.construct.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Now throws a ValueError if size is a negative; previously it threw a InvalidArgumentException.

SplObjectStorage::current

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/splobjectstorage.current.php

Version Description
8.1.0 SplObjectStorage::current() now throws an Error exception if the current position is invalid. Previously, false was returned instead.

spl_autoload

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.spl-autoload.php

Version Description
8.0.0 file_extensions is now nullable.

spl_autoload_extensions

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.spl-autoload-extensions.php

Version Description
8.0.0 file_extensions is now nullable.

spl_autoload_functions

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.spl-autoload-functions.php

Version Description
8.0.0 Return value was updated to always be an array; previously this function returned false if the autoload queue wasn't activated.

spl_autoload_register

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.spl-autoload-register.php

Version Description
8.0.0 callback is now nullable.

sprintf

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.sprintf.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns false on failure.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if the number of arguments is zero; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [width] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [precision] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ArgumentCountError when less arguments are given than required; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.

SQLite3::createFunction

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/sqlite3.createfunction.php

Version Description
7.1.4 The flags parameter has been added.

SQLite3::enableExceptions

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/sqlite3.enableexceptions.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Calling SQLite3::enableExceptions() with enable as false will trigger a E_DEPRECATED warning.

SQLite3::openBlob

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/sqlite3.openblob.php

Version Description
7.2.0 The flags parameter has been added, allowing to write BLOBs; formerly only reading was supported.

SQLite3::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/sqlite3.construct.php

Version Description
7.0.10 The filename can now be empty to use a private, temporary on-disk database.

SQLite3Stmt::bindParam

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/sqlite3stmt.bindparam.php

Version Description
7.4.0 param now also supports the @param notation.

SQLite3Stmt::bindValue

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/sqlite3stmt.bindvalue.php

Version Description
7.4.0 param now also supports the @param notation.

SqlStatementResult::getColumnsCount

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/mysql-xdevapi-sqlstatementresult.getcolumncount.php

Version Description
8.0.14 Method renamed from getColumnCount() to getColumnsCount().

srand

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.srand.php

Version Description
8.3.0 seed is now nullable.
7.1.0 srand() has been made an alias of mt_srand().

SSL context options

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/context.ssl.php

Version Description
7.2.0 Added security_level. Requires OpenSSL >= 1.1.0.

stat

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.stat.php

Version Description
7.4.0 On Windows, the device number is now the serial number of the volume that contains the file, and the inode number is the identifier associated with the file.
7.4.0 The size, atime, mtime and ctime statistics of symlinks are always those of the target. This was previously not the case for NTS builds on Windows.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/stomp.readframe.php

Version Description
Stomp 0.4.0 class_name parameter was added.

Version Description
PECL stomp 1.0.1 The headers parameter was added

Version Description
8.2.0 This function now returns -1 or 1, where it previously returned a negative or positive number.

Version Description
8.0.0 A ValueError is now thrown if size is less than 1 or greater than PHP_INT_MAX. Previously, an E_WARNING level error was emitted and false was returned.

strftime

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.strftime.php

Version Description
8.0.0 timestamp is nullable now.

stripos

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.stripos.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Case folding no longer depends on the locale set with setlocale(). Only ASCII case folding will be done. Non-ASCII bytes will be compared by their byte value.
8.0.0 needle now accepts an empty string.
8.0.0 Passing an int as needle is no longer supported.
7.3.0 Passing an int as needle has been deprecated.
7.1.0 Support for negative offsets has been added.

strip_tags

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.strip-tags.php

Version Description
8.0.0 allowed_tags is nullable now.
7.4.0 The allowed_tags now alternatively accepts an array.

stristr

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.stristr.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Case folding no longer depends on the locale set with setlocale(). Only ASCII case folding will be done. Non-ASCII bytes will be compared by their byte value.
8.0.0 needle now accepts an empty string.
8.0.0 Passing an int as needle is no longer supported.
7.3.0 Passing an int as needle has been deprecated.

Version Description
8.2.0 This function now returns -1 or 1, where it previously returned a negative or positive number.

8.2.0 This function now returns -1 or 1, where it previously returned a negative or positive number.

8.2.0 This function now returns -1 or 1, where it previously returned a negative or positive number.

Version Description
8.2.0 This function now returns -1 or 1, where it previously returned a negative or positive number.

8.0.0 Passing an int as needle is no longer supported.
7.3.0 Passing an int as needle has been deprecated.
7.1.0 Support for negative offsets has been added.

strptime

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.strptime.php

Version Description
8.1.0 This function has been deprecated. Use date_parse_from_format() instead (for locale-independent parsing), or IntlDateFormatter::parse() (for locale-dependent parsing)

8.3.0 The before_needle parameter was added.
8.0.0 needle now accepts an empty string.
8.0.0 Passing an int as needle is no longer supported.
7.3.0 Passing an int as needle has been deprecated.

8.0.0 needle now accepts an empty string.
8.0.0 Passing an int as needle is no longer supported.
7.3.0 Passing an int as needle has been deprecated.

Version Description

Version Description
8.2.0 Case conversion no longer depends on the locale set with setlocale(). Only ASCII characters will be converted.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.strtoupper.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Case conversion no longer depends on the locale set with setlocale(). Only ASCII characters will be converted.

str_getcsv

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.str-getcsv.php

Version Description
7.4.0 The escape parameter now interprets an empty string as signal to disable the proprietary escape mechanism. Formerly, an empty string was treated like the default parameter value.

str_ireplace

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.str-ireplace.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Case folding no longer depends on the locale set with setlocale(). Only ASCII case folding will be done. Non-ASCII bytes will be compared by their byte value.

str_shuffle

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.str-shuffle.php

Version Description
7.1.0 The internal randomization algorithm has been changed to use the » Mersenne Twister Random Number Generator instead of the libc rand function.

str_split

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.str-split.php

Version Description
8.2.0 If string is empty an empty array is now returned. Previously an array containing a single empty string was returned.
8.0.0 If length is less than 1, a ValueError will be thrown now; previously, an error of level E_WARNING has been raised instead, and the function returned false.

str_word_count

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.str-word-count.php

Version Description
8.0.0 characters is nullable now.

substr

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.substr.php

Version Description
8.0.0 length is nullable now. When length is explicitly set to null, the function returns a substring finishing at the end of the string, when it previously returned an empty string.
8.0.0 The function returns an empty string where it previously returned false.

substr_compare

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.substr-compare.php

Version Description
8.2.0 This function now returns -1 or 1, where it previously returned a negative or positive number.
8.0.0 length is nullable now.
7.2.18, 7.3.5 offset may now be equal to the length of haystack.

substr_count

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.substr-count.php

Version Description
8.0.0 length is nullable now.
7.1.0 Support for negative offsets and lengths has been added. length may also be 0 now.

substr_replace

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.substr-replace.php

Version Description
8.0.0 length is nullable now.

SyncEvent::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/syncevent.construct.php

Version Description
PECL sync 1.1.0

Added prefire.

tempnam

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.tempnam.php

Version Description
7.1.0 tempnam() now emits a notice when falling back to the temp directory of the system.

Version Description
8.0.0 tidy::repairString() is a static method now.
8.0.0 config and encoding are nullable now.
8.0.0 This function no longer accepts the useIncludePath parameter.

tidy::__construct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/tidy.construct.php

Version Description
8.0.0 filename, config, encoding and useIncludePath are nullable now.

tidyNode::isHtml

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/tidynode.ishtml.php

Version Description
7.3.24, 7.4.12 This function has been fixed to have reasonable behavior. Previously, almost any node was reported as being an HTML node.

touch

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.touch.php

Version Description
8.0.0 mtime and atime are now nullable.

trigger_error

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.trigger-error.php

Version Description
8.0.0 The function now throws a ValueError if an invalid error_level is specified. Previously, it returned false.

uasort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.uasort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.
8.0.0 If callback expects a parameter to be passed by reference, this function will now emit an E_WARNING.

Version Description
8.2.0 Case conversion no longer depends on the locale set with setlocale(). Only ASCII characters will be converted.

Version Description
8.2.0 Case conversion no longer depends on the locale set with setlocale(). Only ASCII characters will be converted.

uksort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.uksort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.
8.0.0 If callback expects a parameter to be passed by reference, this function will now emit an E_WARNING.

umask

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.umask.php

Version Description
8.0.0 mask is nullable now.

unixtojd

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.unixtojd.php

Version Description
8.0.0 timestamp is nullable now.

unlink

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.unlink.php

Version Description
7.3.0 On Windows, it is now possible to unlink() files with handles in use, while formerly that would fail. However, it is still not possible to re-create the unlinked file, until all handles to it have been closed.

unpack

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.unpack.php

Version Description
7.2.0 float and double types supports both Big Endian and Little Endian.
7.1.0 The optional offset has been added.

unserialize

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.unserialize.php

Version Description
8.3.0 Now emits E_WARNING when the passed string is not unserializeable; previously E_NOTICE was emitted.
7.4.0 Added the max_depth element of options to set the maximum depth of structures permitted during unserialization.
7.1.0 The allowed_classes element of options) is now strictly typed, i.e. if anything other than an array or a bool is given, unserialize() returns false and issues an E_WARNING.

uopz_flags

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.uopz-flags.php

Version Description
PECL uopz 5.0.0 The flags parameter is now optional. Formerly, ZEND_ACC_FETCH had to be passed to use uopz_flags() as getter.

uopz_set_mock

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.uopz-set-mock.php

Version Description
uopz 6.0.0 Mocking static members is no longer supported by this function. uopz_redefine() and uopz_set_return(), or Componere can be used instead.

usort

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.usort.php

Version Description
8.2.0 The return type is true now; previously, it was bool.
8.0.0 If callback expects a parameter to be passed by reference, this function will now emit an E_WARNING.

utf8_decode

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.utf8-decode.php

Version Description
8.2.0 This function has been deprecated.
7.2.0 This function has been moved from the XML extension to the core of PHP. In previous versions, it was only available if the XML extension was installed.

utf8_encode

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.utf8-encode.php

Version Description
8.2.0 This function has been deprecated.
7.2.0 This function has been moved from the XML extension to the core of PHP. In previous versions, it was only available if the XML extension was installed.

var_export

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.var-export.php

Version Description
8.2.0 Exported class names are now fully qualified; previously, the leading backslash was ommitted.
7.3.0 Now exports stdClass objects as an array cast to an object ((object) array( ... )), rather than using the nonexistent method stdClass::__setState(). The practical effect is that now stdClass is exportable, and the resulting code will even work on earlier versions of PHP.

vfprintf

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.vfprintf.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns false on failure.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if the number of arguments is zero; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [width] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [precision] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError when less arguments are given than required; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.vprintf.php

Version Description
8.0.0 This function no longer returns false on failure.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if the number of arguments is zero; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [width] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [precision] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError when less arguments are given than required; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.

8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if the number of arguments is zero; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.

8.0.0 Throw a ValueError if [precision] is less than zero or bigger than PHP_INT_MAX; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.
8.0.0 Throw a ValueError when less arguments are given than required; previously this function emitted a E_WARNING instead.

win32_continue_service

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.win32-continue-service.php

Version Description
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a ValueError on invalid data in parameters, previously false was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 The return type is now void, previously it was mixed.
PECL win32service 0.3.0 This function does not longer require an administrator account if ACL is set for another account.

win32_create_service

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.win32-create-service.php

Version Description
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a ValueError on invalid data in parameters, previously false was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 The return type is now void, previously it was mixed.
PECL win32service 0.4.0 The dependencies, recovery_delay, recovery_action_1, recovery_action_2, recovery_action_3, recovery_reset_period, recovery_enabled, recovery_reboot_msg and recovery_command parameters have been added.

win32_delete_service

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.win32-delete-service.php

Version Description
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a ValueError on invalid data in parameters, previously false was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 The return type is now void, previously it was mixed.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.win32-get-last-control-message.php

Version Description
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a ValueError on invalid data in parameters, previously false was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.
PECL win32service 0.2.0 This function works only in the "cli" SAPI.

win32_pause_service

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.win32-pause-service.php

Version Description
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a ValueError on invalid data in parameters, previously false was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 The return type is now void, previously it was mixed.
PECL win32service 0.3.0 This function does not longer require an administrator account if ACL is set for another account.

win32_query_service_status

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.win32-query-service-status.php

Version Description
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a ValueError on invalid data in parameters, previously false was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 The return type is now array, previously it was mixed.

Version Description
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a ValueError on invalid data in parameters, previously false was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 The return type is now void, previously it was mixed.

Version Description

PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.

Version Description
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a ValueError on invalid data in parameters, previously false was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 The return type is now void, previously it was mixed.
PECL win32service 0.4.0 The parameter gracefulMode has been added.
PECL win32service 0.2.0 This function works only in the "cli" SAPI.

PECL win32service 1.0.0 Throws a Win32ServiceException on error, previously a Win32 Error Code was returned.
PECL win32service 1.0.0 The return type is now void, previously it was mixed.
PECL win32service 0.3.0 This function does not longer require an administrator account if ACL is set for another account.

Worker::unstack

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/worker.unstack.php

Version Description
v3 The parameter to specify the task to unstack has been removed. Now, only the first task in the stack is removed.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.xhprof-enable.php

Version Description
PECL xhprof 0.9.2 The optional options parameter was added.

Version Description

xml_parser_get_option

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.xml-parser-get-option.php

Version Description
8.3.0 The function now returns a boolean for boolean options.
8.0.0 parser expects an XMLParser instance now; previously, a valid xml resource was expected.
8.0.0 A ValueError is now thrown if option is invalid.
7.1.24, 7.2.12, 7.3.0 options now supports XML_OPTION_SKIP_TAGSTART and XML_OPTION_SKIP_WHITE.

xml_parser_set_option

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.xml-parser-set-option.php

Version Description
8.3.0 The value parameter now also accepts booleans. The options XML_OPTION_CASE_FOLDING and XML_OPTION_SKIP_WHITE are now boolean options.
8.0.0 parser expects an XMLParser instance now; previously, a valid xml resource was expected.
8.0.0 A ValueError is now thrown if option is invalid.

xml_parse_into_struct

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.xml-parse-into-struct.php

Version Description
8.0.0 parser expects an XMLParser instance now; previously, a valid xml resource was expected.

xml_set_external_entity_ref_handler

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/function.xml-set-external-entity-ref-handler.php

Version Description
8.0.0 parser expects an XMLParser instance now; previously, a valid xml resource was expected.
7.3.0 The return value of the handler is no longer ignored if the extension has been built against libxml. Formerly, the return value has been ignored, and parsing did never stop.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/ziparchive.addfile.php

Version Description
8.0.0 / 1.18.0 flags was added.
8.3.0 / 1.22.1 ZipArchive::FL_OPEN_FILE_NOW was added.
8.3.0 / 1.22.2 ZipArchive::LENGTH_TO_END and ZipArchive::LENGTH_UNCHECKED were added.

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/ziparchive.addfromstring.php

Version Description
8.0.0 / 1.18.0 flags was added.

ZipArchive::addGlob

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/ziparchive.addglob.php

Version Description
8.0.0 / 1.18.0 "flags" in options was added.
8.0.0 / 1.18.1 "comp_method", "comp_flags", "enc_method" and "enc_password" in options were added.
8.3.0 / 1.22.1 ZipArchive::FL_OPEN_FILE_NOW was added.

ZipArchive::getStatusString

Change Log for https://www.php.net/manual/en/ziparchive.getstatusstring.php

Version Description
8.0.0 / 1.18.0 This method can be called on closed archive.
8.0.0 / 1.18.0 This method no longer returns false on failure.

Version Description
8.3.0 / 1.22.1 ZipArchive::FL_OPEN_FILE_NOW was added.
8.3.0 / 1.22.2 ZipArchive::LENGTH_TO_END and ZipArchive::LENGTH_UNCHECKED were added.
